query.body.value: SELECT CBM.*, conv_eid, PA_ACT.pdaccid actid, PA_ACT.pdacc_eid acteid, PA_ACT.pdacc_gid actgid, PA_ACT.pdacc_ufn actfn, PA_ACT.pdacc_upsd actpsd, PA_ACT.pdacc_gdr actgdr, PA_ACT.pdacc_todelete acttodl, PA_TGT.pdaccid tgtid, PA_TGT.pdacc_eid tgteid, PA_TGT.pdacc_gid tgtgid, PA_TGT.pdacc_ufn tgtfn, PA_TGT.pdacc_upsd tgtpsd, PA_TGT.pdacc_gdr tgtgdr, PA_TGT.pdacc_todelete tgttodl FROM ChatBox_Messages CBM, ChatBox_Conversations CCV, Proddb_Accounts PA_ACT, Proddb_Accounts PA_TGT WHERE chmsg_convid = CCV.convid AND chmsg_actor = PA_ACT.pdaccid AND chmsg_target = PA_TGT.pdaccid AND convid = :convid AND ( chmsg_ad_date_tstamp IS NULL OR chmsg_td_date_tstamp IS NULL );

UPDATE ChatBox_Conversations SET conv_ad_date = NULL, conv_ad_date_tstamp = NULL, conv_ad_rsncaz = NULL, conv_td_date = NULL, conv_td_date_tstamp = NULL, conv_td_rsncaz = NULL, conv_sd_date = NULL, conv_sd_date_tstamp = NULL, conv_nxtdldate = NULL, conv_nxtdldate_tstamp = NULL WHERE convid = :convid;

SELECT chmsg_convid, conv_eid, chmsgid, chmsg_eid, chmsg_msg, chmsg_actor, chmsg_target, chmsg_cdate_tstamp, chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp, chmsg_rdate_tstamp FROM ChatBox_Messages, ChatBox_Conversations WHERE ( chmsg_actor = :actor1 OR chmsg_target = :actor2 ) AND chmsg_convid = convid AND convid != :pvt_cvid1 AND chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp <= ( SELECT MAX(chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp) FROM ChatBox_Messages WHERE chmsg_convid = :pvt_cvid2 ) HAVING chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp IN ( SELECT MAX(chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp) FROM ChatBox_Messages GROUP BY chmsg_convid ) ORDER BY chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

query.body.value: SELECT CBM.*, conv_eid, PA_ACT.pdaccid actid, PA_ACT.pdacc_eid acteid, PA_ACT.pdacc_gid actgid, PA_ACT.pdacc_ufn actfn, PA_ACT.pdacc_upsd actpsd, PA_ACT.pdacc_gdr actgdr, PA_ACT.pdacc_todelete acttodl, PA_TGT.pdaccid tgtid, PA_TGT.pdacc_eid tgteid, PA_TGT.pdacc_gid tgtgid, PA_TGT.pdacc_ufn tgtfn, PA_TGT.pdacc_upsd tgtpsd, PA_TGT.pdacc_gdr tgtgdr, PA_TGT.pdacc_todelete tgttodl FROM ChatBox_Messages CBM, ChatBox_Conversations CCV, Proddb_Accounts PA_ACT, Proddb_Accounts PA_TGT WHERE chmsg_convid = CCV.convid AND chmsg_actor = PA_ACT.pdaccid AND chmsg_target = PA_TGT.pdaccid AND chmsgid = :cbmid;

SELECT CBM.*, conv_eid, PA_ACT.pdaccid actid, PA_ACT.pdacc_eid acteid, PA_ACT.pdacc_gid actgid, PA_ACT.pdacc_ufn actfn, PA_ACT.pdacc_upsd actpsd, PA_ACT.pdacc_gdr actgdr, PA_ACT.pdacc_todelete acttodl, PA_TGT.pdaccid tgtid, PA_TGT.pdacc_eid tgteid, PA_TGT.pdacc_gid tgtgid, PA_TGT.pdacc_ufn tgtfn, PA_TGT.pdacc_upsd tgtpsd, PA_TGT.pdacc_gdr tgtgdr, PA_TGT.pdacc_todelete tgttodl FROM ChatBox_Messages CBM, ChatBox_Conversations CCV, Proddb_Accounts PA_ACT, Proddb_Accounts PA_TGT WHERE chmsg_convid = CCV.convid AND chmsg_actor = PA_ACT.pdaccid AND chmsg_target = PA_TGT.pdaccid AND chmsg_eid = :cbmeid;

INSERT INTO ChatBox_Messages (chmsg_convid,chmsg_msg,chmsg_actor,chmsg_target,chmsg_fe_cdate,chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp,chmsg_locip,chmsg_useragt,chmsg_cdate,chmsg_cdate_tstamp) VALUES (:convid,:message,:actor,:target,:fetime,:fetime_tstamp,:locip,:useragt,:cdate,:cdate_tstamp);
DELETE FROM ChatBox_Messages WHERE chmsgid = :id;
SELECT chmsgid, chmsg_eid FROM ChatBox_Messages WHERE chmsg_convid = :cvid ORDER BY chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT chmsgid, chmsg_eid, chmsg_msg, chmsg_actor, PA_A.pdacc_eid chmsg_acteid, chmsg_target, PA_T.pdacc_eid chmsg_tgteid, chmsg_cdate, chmsg_cdate_tstamp, chmsg_fe_cdate, chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp, chmsg_rdate, chmsg_rdate_tstamp, chmsg_ad_date, chmsg_ad_date_tstamp, chmsg_td_date, chmsg_td_date_tstamp FROM ChatBox_Messages, Proddb_Accounts PA_A, Proddb_Accounts PA_T WHERE PA_A.pdaccid = chmsg_actor AND PA_T.pdaccid = chmsg_target AND chmsg_convid = :cvid ORDER BY chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

( SELECT chmsgid, chmsg_eid FROM ChatBox_Messages WHERE chmsg_convid = :cvid1 AND chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp >= :pvt_tm1 AND chmsgid != :pvt_cmid1 ORDER BY chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit_gt ) UNION ( SELECT chmsgid, chmsg_eid FROM ChatBox_Messages WHERE chmsg_convid = :cvid2 AND chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp <= :pvt_tm2 AND chmsgid != :pvt_cmid2 ORDER BY chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit_lt ) ORDER BY chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp DESC;

( SELECT chmsgid, chmsg_eid, chmsg_msg, chmsg_actor, PA_A.pdacc_eid chmsg_acteid, chmsg_target, PA_T.pdacc_eid chmsg_tgteid, chmsg_cdate, chmsg_cdate_tstamp, chmsg_fe_cdate, chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp, chmsg_rdate, chmsg_rdate_tstamp, chmsg_ad_date, chmsg_ad_date_tstamp, chmsg_td_date, chmsg_td_date_tstamp, chmsg_sd_date, chmsg_sd_date_tstamp, chmsg_nxtdldate, chmsg_nxtdldate_tstamp FROM ChatBox_Messages, Proddb_Accounts PA_A, Proddb_Accounts PA_T WHERE PA_A.pdaccid = chmsg_actor AND PA_T.pdaccid = chmsg_target AND chmsg_convid = :cvid1 AND chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp >= :pvt_tm1 AND chmsgid != :pvt_cmid1 ORDER BY chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit_gt ) UNION ( SELECT chmsgid, chmsg_eid, chmsg_msg, chmsg_actor, PA_A.pdacc_eid chmsg_acteid, chmsg_target, PA_T.pdacc_eid chmsg_tgteid, chmsg_cdate, chmsg_cdate_tstamp, chmsg_fe_cdate, chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp, chmsg_rdate, chmsg_rdate_tstamp, chmsg_ad_date, chmsg_ad_date_tstamp, chmsg_td_date, chmsg_td_date_tstamp, chmsg_sd_date, chmsg_sd_date_tstamp, chmsg_nxtdldate, chmsg_nxtdldate_tstamp FROM ChatBox_Messages, Proddb_Accounts PA_A, Proddb_Accounts PA_T WHERE PA_A.pdaccid = chmsg_actor AND PA_T.pdaccid = chmsg_target AND chmsg_convid = :cvid2 AND chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp <= :pvt_tm2 AND chmsgid != :pvt_cmid2 ORDER BY chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit_lt ) ORDER BY chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp DESC;
UPDATE ChatBox_Messages SET chmsg_ad_date = :date, chmsg_ad_date_tstamp = :tstamp, chmsg_ad_rsncaz = :rsn WHERE chmsgid = :id;
UPDATE ChatBox_Messages SET chmsg_td_date = :date, chmsg_td_date_tstamp = :tstamp, chmsg_td_rsncaz = :rsn WHERE chmsgid = :id;
UPDATE ChatBox_Messages SET chmsg_sd_date = :date, chmsg_sd_date_tstamp = :tstamp, chmsg_sd_rsncaz = :rsn WHERE chmsgid = :id;
UPDATE ChatBox_Messages SET chmsg_nxtdldate = :date, chmsg_nxtdldate_tstamp = :tstamp WHERE chmsgid = :id;

SELECT chmsgid, chmsg_eid, chmsg_msg, chmsg_actor, PA_A.pdacc_eid chmsg_acteid, chmsg_target, PA_T.pdacc_eid chmsg_tgteid, chmsg_cdate, chmsg_cdate_tstamp, chmsg_fe_cdate, chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp, chmsg_rdate, chmsg_rdate_tstamp, chmsg_ad_date, chmsg_ad_date_tstamp, chmsg_td_date, chmsg_td_date_tstamp, chmsg_sd_date, chmsg_sd_date_tstamp, chmsg_nxtdldate, chmsg_nxtdldate_tstamp FROM ChatBox_Messages, Proddb_Accounts PA_A, Proddb_Accounts PA_T WHERE PA_A.pdaccid = chmsg_actor AND PA_T.pdaccid = chmsg_target AND chmsg_convid = :cvid AND chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp <= :pvt_tm AND chmsgid != :pvt_cmid ORDER BY chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit
SELECT chmsgid, chmsg_eid FROM ChatBox_Messages WHERE chmsg_convid = :cvid AND chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp <= :pvt_tm AND chmsgid != :pvt_cmid ORDER BY chmsg_fe_cdate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit

SELECT count(chmsgid) cn FROM ChatBox_Messages WHERE chmsg_target = :uid AND chmsg_rdate_tstamp IS NULL AND chmsg_ad_date_tstamp IS NULL AND chmsg_td_date_tstamp IS NULL AND chmsg_nxtdldate_tstamp IS NULL;

SELECT count(DISTINCT chmsg_convid) cn FROM ChatBox_Messages WHERE chmsg_target = :uid AND chmsg_rdate_tstamp IS NULL AND chmsg_ad_date_tstamp IS NULL AND chmsg_td_date_tstamp IS NULL AND chmsg_nxtdldate_tstamp IS NULL;

SELECT count(chmsgid) cn FROM ChatBox_Messages WHERE chmsg_target = :uid AND chmsg_convid != :cpi AND chmsg_rdate_tstamp IS NULL AND chmsg_ad_date_tstamp IS NULL AND chmsg_td_date_tstamp IS NULL AND chmsg_nxtdldate_tstamp IS NULL;

SELECT count(DISTINCT chmsg_convid) cn FROM ChatBox_Messages WHERE chmsg_target = :uid AND chmsg_convid != :cpi AND chmsg_rdate_tstamp IS NULL AND chmsg_ad_date_tstamp IS NULL AND chmsg_td_date_tstamp IS NULL AND chmsg_nxtdldate_tstamp IS NULL;

SELECT count(chmsgid) cn FROM ChatBox_Messages WHERE chmsg_target = :uid AND chmsg_convid = :cpi AND chmsg_rdate_tstamp IS NULL AND chmsg_ad_date_tstamp IS NULL AND chmsg_td_date_tstamp IS NULL AND chmsg_nxtdldate_tstamp IS NULL;

SELECT count(DISTINCT chmsg_convid) cn FROM ChatBox_Messages WHERE chmsg_target = :uid AND chmsg_convid = :cpi AND chmsg_rdate_tstamp IS NULL AND chmsg_ad_date_tstamp IS NULL AND chmsg_td_date_tstamp IS NULL AND chmsg_nxtdldate_tstamp IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM URL_IN_CNTTS INNER JOIN CHATBOX_MESSAGES ON uic_ucid = chmsgid WHERE chmsg_eid = uic_uceid AND uic_uceid = :ceid AND uic_uctp = 5;

INSERT INTO UserActyLogs (ualg_actuid,ualg_ssid,ualg_locip_str,ualg_locip_num,ualg_useragt,ualg_wkr,ualg_fe_url,ualg_srv_url,ualg_isax,ualg_adate,ualg_adate_tstamp,ualg_refobj,ualg_uatid,ualg_uanid,ualg_ispasv,ualg_refobj_lib,ualg_remarks) VALUES (:uid,:ssid,:locip_str,:locip_num,:useragt,:wkr,:fe_url,:srv_url,:isax,:adate,:adate_tstamp,:refobj,:uatid,:uanid,:ispasv,:reflib,:remarks);
SELECT * FROM UserActyLogs WHERE ualg_actuid = :uid AND ualg_adate_tstamp <= :now AND ualg_adate_tstamp >= :minus ORDER BY ualg_adate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

INSERT INTO UserActyLogs (ualg_actuid,ualg_ssid,ualg_locip_str,ualg_locip_num,ualg_useragt,ualg_wkr,ualg_fe_url,ualg_srv_url,ualg_isax,ualg_adate,ualg_adate_tstamp,ualg_refobj,ualg_uatid,ualg_uanid,ualg_ispasv,ualg_refobj_lib,ualg_remarks) VALUES (:uid,:ssid,:locip_str,:locip_num,:useragt,:wkr,:fe_url,:srv_url,:isax,:adate,:adate_tstamp,:refobj,:uatid,:uanid,:ispasv,:reflib,:remarks);

SELECT UserActyLogs.* FROM UAL_ActionTypes, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN Reactions ON reactid = ualg_refobj INNER JOIN Articles ON react_artid = artid WHERE uat_id = ualg_uatid AND art_accid = :ref_uid1 AND ualgid NOT IN ( SELECT pmrpt_ualgid FROM Postman_Reports WHERE pmrpt_rcptuid = :ref_uid2 ) AND uat_id >= 600 AND ualg_adate_tstamp >= :ref_time ORDER BY ualg_adate_tstamp ASC;

query.note.value: Récupèrer les activités relatives à l'ajout d'une REACTION sur un Article appartenant au compte pivot.

query.body.value:
SELECT UserActyLogs.*, Reactions.*, Articles.*, PA_ACT.pdaccid act_uid, PA_ACT.pdacc_eid act_ueid, PA_ACT.pdacc_ufn act_ufn, PA_ACT.pdacc_upsd act_upsd, PA_TAR.pdaccid tag_uid, PA_TAR.pdacc_eid tag_ueid, PA_TAR.pdacc_ufn tag_ufn, PA_TAR.pdacc_upsd tag_upsd
FROM UAL_ActionTypes, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN Reactions ON reactid = ualg_refobj INNER JOIN Articles ON react_artid = artid
INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_ACT ON PA_ACT.pdaccid = react_writer /* TARGET : Proprietaire de l'ARTICLE */ INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_TAR ON PA_TAR.pdaccid = art_accid
WHERE uat_id = ualg_uatid
AND PA_ACT.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_TAR.pdacc_todelete = 0
/* CONTRAINTES : ACTOR n'est pas ART_OWNER */ AND art_accid != ualg_actuid
AND ualgid NOT IN ( SELECT pmrptem_ualgid FROM Postman_Reports_Email WHERE pmrptem_rcptuid = PA_TAR.pdaccid ) AND uat_id = 600 AND ualgid = :uaid;

query.note.value: Récupèrer les activités relatives à l'ajout d'une REACTION sur un Article appartenant au compte pivot.

query.body.value: SELECT UserActyLogs.*, artid aid, pdaccid aoid, pdacc_eid aoeid FROM UAL_ActionTypes, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN Table_Evals ON tbevlid = ualg_refobj INNER JOIN Articles ON tbevl_artid = artid INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts ON art_accid = pdaccid WHERE uat_id = ualg_uatid AND art_accid = :ref_uid1 AND ualgid NOT IN ( SELECT pmrpt_ualgid FROM Postman_Reports WHERE pmrpt_rcptuid = :ref_uid2 ) AND uat_id IN (700,701) AND ualg_adate_tstamp >= :ref_time ORDER BY ualg_adate_tstamp ASC;

query.note.value: Récupèrer les activités relatives à l'ajout d'un EVALUATION sur un Article appartenant au compte pivot.

query.body.value:
SELECT UserActyLogs.*, Table_Evals.*, Articles.*, PA_ACT.pdaccid act_uid, PA_ACT.pdacc_eid act_ueid, PA_ACT.pdacc_ufn act_ufn, PA_ACT.pdacc_upsd act_upsd, PA_TAR.pdaccid tag_uid, PA_TAR.pdacc_eid tag_ueid, PA_TAR.pdacc_ufn tag_ufn, PA_TAR.pdacc_upsd tag_upsd
FROM UAL_ActionTypes, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN Table_Evals ON tbevlid = ualg_refobj INNER JOIN Prod_Events ON tbevl_start_evtid = pdevtid INNER JOIN Articles ON tbevl_artid = artid
INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_ACT ON PA_ACT.pdaccid = pdevt_acc_actor /* TARGET : Proprietaire de l'ARTICLE */ INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_TAR ON PA_TAR.pdaccid = art_accid
WHERE uat_id = ualg_uatid
AND PA_ACT.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_TAR.pdacc_todelete = 0
/* CONTRAINTES : ACTOR n'est pas ART_OWNER */ AND art_accid != ualg_actuid /* CONTRAINTES : EVAL est d'actualité */ AND tbevl_end_evtid IS NULL /* CONTRAINTES : EVAL n'est PAS AUTOBUILD */ AND is_autobuild = 0
AND ualgid NOT IN ( SELECT pmrptem_ualgid FROM Postman_Reports_Email WHERE pmrptem_rcptuid = PA_TAR.pdaccid ) AND uat_id IN (700,701) AND ualgid = :uaid;

query.note.value: Récupèrer les activités relatives à l'ajout d'un EVALUATION sur un Article appartenant au compte pivot.

query.body.value: SELECT UserActyLogs.* FROM UAL_ActionTypes, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN USERTAGs ON ustg_id = ualg_refobj WHERE uat_id = ualg_uatid AND ustg_tgtuid = :ref_uid1 AND ualgid NOT IN ( SELECT pmrpt_ualgid FROM Postman_Reports WHERE pmrpt_rcptuid = :ref_uid2 ) AND uat_id IN (1101,1102,1106,1107) AND ualg_adate_tstamp >= :ref_time ORDER BY ualg_adate_tstamp ASC;

query.body.value: SELECT UserActyLogs.* FROM UAL_ActionTypes, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN TESTY_REACTIONS ON tsrcid = ualg_refobj INNER JOIN TESTIES ON tstid = tsrc_tstid WHERE uat_id = ualg_uatid AND ( tst_ouid = :ref_uid1 OR tst_tguid = :ref_uid3 ) AND ualgid NOT IN ( SELECT pmrpt_ualgid FROM Postman_Reports WHERE pmrpt_rcptuid = :ref_uid2 ) AND ualg_uatid IN (1212) AND ualg_adate_tstamp >= :ref_time ORDER BY ualg_adate_tstamp ASC;

query.body.value: SELECT UserActyLogs.* FROM UAL_ActionTypes, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN TESTY_LIKES_HISTY ON tlkh_id = ualg_refobj INNER JOIN TESTIES ON tstid = tlkh_tstid WHERE uat_id = ualg_uatid AND ( tst_ouid = :ref_uid1 OR tst_tguid = :ref_uid3 ) AND ualgid NOT IN ( SELECT pmrpt_ualgid FROM Postman_Reports WHERE pmrpt_rcptuid = :ref_uid2 ) AND ualg_uatid IN (1221) AND ualg_adate_tstamp >= :ref_time ORDER BY ualg_adate_tstamp ASC;

query.note.value: Récupèrer les activités relatives aux TESTY LIKES où le compte pivot est le propriétaire

query.body.value:
SELECT UserActyLogs.*, TESTIES.*, PA_ACT.pdaccid act_uid, PA_ACT.pdacc_eid act_ueid, PA_ACT.pdacc_ufn act_ufn, PA_ACT.pdacc_upsd act_upsd, PA_TAR.pdaccid tag_uid, PA_TAR.pdacc_eid tag_ueid, PA_TAR.pdacc_ufn tag_ufn, PA_TAR.pdacc_upsd tag_upsd
FROM UAL_ActionTypes, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN TESTY_LIKES_HISTY ON tlkh_id = ualg_refobj INNER JOIN TESTIES ON tstid = tlkh_tstid
INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_ACT ON PA_ACT.pdaccid = tlkh_accid /* TARGET : Proprietaire de l'ARTICLE */ INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_TAR ON PA_TAR.pdaccid = tst_ouid
WHERE uat_id = ualg_uatid
AND PA_ACT.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_TAR.pdacc_todelete = 0
/* CONTRAINTES : ACTOR n'est pas ART_OWNER */ AND tst_ouid != ualg_actuid
AND ualgid NOT IN ( SELECT pmrptem_ualgid FROM Postman_Reports_Email WHERE pmrptem_rcptuid = PA_TAR.pdaccid ) AND ualg_uatid IN (1221) AND ualgid = :uaid;

query.note.value: Récupèrer les activités relatives aux TESTY LIKES où le compte pivot est le propriétaire

query.body.value:
SELECT UserActyLogs.*, TESTIES.*, PA_ACT.pdaccid act_uid, PA_ACT.pdacc_eid act_ueid, PA_ACT.pdacc_ufn act_ufn, PA_ACT.pdacc_upsd act_upsd, PA_TAR.pdaccid tag_uid, PA_TAR.pdacc_eid tag_ueid, PA_TAR.pdacc_ufn tag_ufn, PA_TAR.pdacc_upsd tag_upsd
FROM UAL_ActionTypes, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN TESTY_LIKES_HISTY ON tlkh_id = ualg_refobj INNER JOIN TESTIES ON tstid = tlkh_tstid
INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_ACT ON PA_ACT.pdaccid = tlkh_accid /* TARGET : TARGET de l'ARTICLE */ INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_TAR ON PA_TAR.pdaccid = tst_tguid
WHERE uat_id = ualg_uatid
AND PA_ACT.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_TAR.pdacc_todelete = 0
/* CONTRAINTES : ACTOR n'est pas ART_TARGET */ AND tst_tguid != ualg_actuid /* CONTRAINTES : ART_OWNER n'est pas ART_TARGET */ AND tst_ouid != tst_tguid
AND ualgid NOT IN ( SELECT pmrptem_ualgid FROM Postman_Reports_Email WHERE pmrptem_rcptuid = PA_TAR.pdaccid ) AND ualg_uatid IN (1221) AND ualgid = :uaid;

query.note.value: Récupèrer les activités relatives aux TESTY LIKES où le compte pivot est le propriétaire

query.body.value: SELECT UserActyLogs.* FROM UAL_ActionTypes, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN TABLERELATIONS ON tbrel_id = ualg_refobj WHERE uat_id = ualg_uatid AND tbrel_acc_targ = :ref_uid1 AND ualgid NOT IN ( SELECT pmrpt_ualgid FROM Postman_Reports WHERE pmrpt_rcptuid = :ref_uid2 ) AND ualg_uatid IN (300) AND ualg_adate_tstamp >= :ref_time ORDER BY ualg_adate_tstamp ASC;

query.note.value: Récupèrer les activités relatives aux FOLLOW où le compte pivot est TARGET

query.body.value:
SELECT UserActyLogs.*, TR.*, PA_ACT.pdaccid act_uid, PA_ACT.pdacc_eid act_ueid, PA_ACT.pdacc_ufn act_ufn, PA_ACT.pdacc_upsd act_upsd, PA_TAR.pdaccid tag_uid, PA_TAR.pdacc_eid tag_ueid, PA_TAR.pdacc_ufn tag_ufn, PA_TAR.pdacc_upsd tag_upsd
FROM UAL_ActionTypes, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN TABLERELATIONS TR ON tbrel_id = ualg_refobj
INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_ACT ON PA_ACT.pdaccid = TR.tbrel_acc_actor /* TARGET : TARGET */ INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_TAR ON PA_TAR.pdaccid = TR.tbrel_acc_targ
WHERE uat_id = ualg_uatid
AND PA_ACT.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_TAR.pdacc_todelete = 0
/* CONTRAINTES : ACTOR est FOLLOWER */ AND TR.tbrel_acc_actor = ualg_actuid /* CONTRAINTES : La RELATION est d'actualité */ AND TR.tbrel_dateend_tstamp IS NULL
AND ualgid NOT IN ( SELECT pmrptem_ualgid FROM Postman_Reports_Email WHERE pmrptem_rcptuid = PA_TAR.pdaccid ) AND ualg_uatid IN (300) AND ualgid = :uaid;

query.note.value: Récupèrer les activités relatives aux FOLLOW où le compte pivot est TARGET

query.body.value: SELECT UserActyLogs.* FROM UAL_ActionTypes, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN TRABO_HISTY ON traboid = ualg_refobj INNER JOIN TRENDS ON trid = trabo_trid WHERE uat_id = ualg_uatid AND trd_owner = :ref_uid1 AND ualgid NOT IN ( SELECT pmrpt_ualgid FROM Postman_Reports WHERE pmrpt_rcptuid = :ref_uid2 ) AND ualg_uatid IN (901) AND ualg_adate_tstamp >= :ref_time ORDER BY ualg_adate_tstamp ASC;

Récupèrer les activités relatives aux FAV ARTICLES

query.body.value:
SELECT UserActyLogs.*, ARTICLES_FAVORITE_HISTY.*, ARTICLES.*, PA_ACT.pdaccid act_uid, PA_ACT.pdacc_eid act_ueid, PA_ACT.pdacc_ufn act_ufn, PA_ACT.pdacc_upsd act_upsd, PA_TAR.pdaccid tag_uid, PA_TAR.pdacc_eid tag_ueid, PA_TAR.pdacc_ufn tag_ufn, PA_TAR.pdacc_upsd tag_upsd
FROM UAL_ActionTypes, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN ARTICLES_FAVORITE_HISTY ON arfv_id = ualg_refobj INNER JOIN ARTICLES ON artid = arfv_artid
INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_ACT ON PA_ACT.pdaccid = arfv_accid /* TARGET : Proprietaire de l'ARTICLE */ INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_TAR ON PA_TAR.pdaccid = art_accid
WHERE uat_id = ualg_uatid
AND PA_ACT.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_TAR.pdacc_todelete = 0
/* CONTRAINTES : ACTOR n'est pas ART_OWNER */ AND art_accid != ualg_actuid /* CONTRAINTES : Le FAV est d'actualité */ AND arfv_enddate_tstamp IS NULL
AND ualgid NOT IN ( SELECT pmrptem_ualgid FROM Postman_Reports_Email WHERE pmrptem_rcptuid = PA_TAR.pdaccid ) AND ualg_uatid = 803 AND ualgid = :uaid;

query.note.value: Récupèrer les activités relatives aux FAV ARTICLES

query.body.value: INSERT INTO Postman_Reports (pmrpt_rcptuid,pmrpt_type,pmrpt_uatid,pmrpt_isAuto,pmrpt_ualgid,pmrpt_datecrea,pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp) VALUES (:rcptuid,:type,:uat,:isAuto,:ualgid,:datecrea,:tstamp);

query.note.value: Créer une occurrence de Notification pour REACTION.

query.body.value: SELECT pmrpt_eid as pmrid FROM Postman_Reports WHERE pmrpt_rcptuid = :ref_uid ORDER BY pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT pmrpt_eid as pmrid FROM Postman_Reports, UAL_ActionTypes, UserActyLogs WHERE pmrpt_ualgid = ualgid AND ualg_uatid = uat_id AND pmrpt_rcptuid = :ref_uid AND ( ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_RCT' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM Reactions WHERE reactid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_USTG' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM USTGs_ARTICLE WHERE ustgart_ustgid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_USTG' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM USTGs_REACTION WHERE ustgrct_ustgid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_EVL' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM Table_Evals WHERE tbevlid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 ) /* TQR.VB30 */ OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_USTG' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM USTGs_TESTY WHERE ustgtst_ustgid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (1106) ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_USTG' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM USTGs_PDREACT, PRODDB_REACTIONS INNER JOIN TESTY_REACTIONS ON tsrc_pdrid = pdrct_id WHERE ustgpdr_pdrid = pdrct_id AND ustgpdr_ustgid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (1107) ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_TST' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM TESTIES WHERE tstid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (1202) ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_TST' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM TESTY_REACTIONS WHERE tsrcid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (1212) ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_TST' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM TESTY_LIKES_HISTY WHERE tlkh_id = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (1221) ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_TRD' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM TRABO_HISTY WHERE traboid = ualg_refobj AND trabo_dateterm_tstamp IS NULL ) = 1 ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_REL' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM TABLERELATIONS WHERE tbrel_id = ualg_refobj AND tbrel_relsts IN (1,2) AND tbrel_dateend_tstamp IS NULL ) = 1 ) /* TQR.VB31 */ OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_FAV' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM ARTICLES_FAVORITE_HISTY WHERE arfv_id = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (803) ) ) AND pmrpt_rcptuid != ualg_actuid ORDER BY pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;
SELECT prt_lib as typ, count(pmrpt_id) cn FROM Postman_Report_Types LEFT JOIN Postman_Reports ON pmrpt_type = prt_id WHERE pmrpt_rcptuid = :ref_uid AND pmrpt_datergr_tstamp IS NULL GROUP BY typ;

query.note.value: Le nombre de Notifications non lues groupées par type

query.body.value: SELECT prt_lib as typ, IFNULL(count(pmrpt_id),0) cn FROM Postman_Report_Types LEFT JOIN Postman_Reports ON pmrpt_type = prt_id LEFT JOIN UserActyLogs ON pmrpt_ualgid = ualgid LEFT JOIN UAL_ActionTypes ON ualg_uatid = uat_id WHERE pmrpt_rcptuid = :ref_uid AND ( ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_RCT' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM Reactions WHERE reactid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_USTG' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM USTGs_ARTICLE WHERE ustgart_ustgid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_USTG' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM USTGs_REACTION WHERE ustgrct_ustgid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_EVL' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM Table_Evals WHERE tbevlid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 ) /* TQR.VB30 */ OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_USTG' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM USTGs_TESTY WHERE ustgtst_ustgid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (1106) ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_USTG' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM USTGs_PDREACT, PRODDB_REACTIONS INNER JOIN TESTY_REACTIONS ON tsrc_pdrid = pdrct_id WHERE ustgpdr_pdrid = pdrct_id AND ustgpdr_ustgid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (1107) ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_TST' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM TESTIES WHERE tstid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (1202) ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_TST' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM TESTY_REACTIONS WHERE tsrcid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (1212) ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_TST' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM TESTY_LIKES_HISTY WHERE tlkh_id = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (1221) ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_TRD' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM TRABO_HISTY WHERE traboid = ualg_refobj AND trabo_dateterm_tstamp IS NULL ) = 1 ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_REL' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM TABLERELATIONS WHERE tbrel_id = ualg_refobj AND tbrel_relsts IN (1,2) AND tbrel_dateend_tstamp IS NULL ) = 1 ) /* TQR.VB31 */ OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_FAV' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM ARTICLES_FAVORITE_HISTY WHERE arfv_id = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (803) ) ) AND pmrpt_datergr_tstamp IS NULL GROUP BY typ;

query.note.value: Le nombre de Notifications non lues groupées par type

query.body.value: SELECT pmrpt_eid as pmrid FROM Postman_Reports WHERE pmrpt_rcptuid = :ref_uid AND pmrpt_eid != :fri AND pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp <= :frt ORDER BY pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

query.body.value: SELECT pmrpt_id, pmrpt_eid, uat_id, uat_eid FROM Postman_Reports, UAL_ActionTypes, UserActyLogs WHERE pmrpt_ualgid = ualgid AND ualg_uatid = uat_id AND pmrpt_rcptuid = :ref_uid AND pmrpt_eid != :fri AND ( ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_RCT' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM Reactions WHERE reactid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_USTG' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM USTGs_ARTICLE WHERE ustgart_ustgid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_USTG' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM USTGs_REACTION WHERE ustgrct_ustgid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_EVL' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM Table_Evals WHERE tbevlid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 ) /* TQR.VB30 */ OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_USTG' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM USTGs_TESTY WHERE ustgtst_ustgid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (1106) ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_USTG' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM USTGs_PDREACT, PRODDB_REACTIONS INNER JOIN TESTY_REACTIONS ON tsrc_pdrid = pdrct_id WHERE ustgpdr_pdrid = pdrct_id AND ustgpdr_ustgid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (1107) ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_TST' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM TESTIES WHERE tstid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (1202) ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_TST' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM TESTY_REACTIONS WHERE tsrcid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (1212) ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_TST' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM TESTY_LIKES_HISTY WHERE tlkh_id = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (1221) ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_TRD' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM TRABO_HISTY WHERE traboid = ualg_refobj AND trabo_dateterm_tstamp IS NULL ) = 1 ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_REL' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM TABLERELATIONS WHERE tbrel_id = ualg_refobj AND tbrel_relsts IN (1,2) AND tbrel_dateend_tstamp IS NULL ) = 1 ) /* TQR.VB31 */ OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_FAV' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM ARTICLES_FAVORITE_HISTY WHERE arfv_id = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (803) ) ) AND pmrpt_rcptuid != ualg_actuid AND pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp <= :frt ORDER BY pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT pmrpt_id, pmrpt_eid, uat_id, uat_eid FROM Postman_Reports, UserActyLogs, UAL_ActionTypes WHERE pmrpt_ualgid = ualgid AND ualg_uatid = uat_id AND pmrpt_rcptuid = :ref_uid AND pmrpt_eid != :fri AND pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp >= :frt ORDER BY pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

query.note.value: Les ids et type Notifications les plus récentes dans la limite

query.body.value: SELECT pmrpt_id, pmrpt_eid, uat_id, uat_eid FROM Postman_Reports, UAL_ActionTypes, UserActyLogs WHERE pmrpt_ualgid = ualgid AND ualg_uatid = uat_id AND pmrpt_rcptuid = :ref_uid AND pmrpt_eid != :fri AND ( ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_RCT' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM Reactions WHERE reactid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_USTG' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM USTGs_ARTICLE WHERE ustgart_ustgid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_USTG' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM USTGs_REACTION WHERE ustgrct_ustgid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_EVL' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM Table_Evals WHERE tbevlid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 ) /* TQR.VB30 */ OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_USTG' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM USTGs_TESTY WHERE ustgtst_ustgid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (1106) ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_USTG' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM USTGs_PDREACT, PRODDB_REACTIONS INNER JOIN TESTY_REACTIONS ON tsrc_pdrid = pdrct_id WHERE ustgpdr_pdrid = pdrct_id AND ustgpdr_ustgid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (1107) ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_TST' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM TESTIES WHERE tstid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (1202) ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_TST' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM TESTY_REACTIONS WHERE tsrcid = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (1212) ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_TST' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM TESTY_LIKES_HISTY WHERE tlkh_id = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (1221) ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_TRD' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM TRABO_HISTY WHERE traboid = ualg_refobj AND trabo_dateterm_tstamp IS NULL ) = 1 ) OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_REL' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM TABLERELATIONS WHERE tbrel_id = ualg_refobj AND tbrel_relsts IN (1,2) AND tbrel_dateend_tstamp IS NULL ) = 1 ) /* TQR.VB31 */ OR ( uat_grp = 'TyGP_FAV' AND ( SELECT count(*) FROM ARTICLES_FAVORITE_HISTY WHERE arfv_id = ualg_refobj ) = 1 AND ualg_uatid IN (803) ) ) AND pmrpt_rcptuid != ualg_actuid AND pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp >= :frt ORDER BY pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;
SELECT Postman_Reports.* FROM Postman_Reports WHERE pmrpt_eid = :ref_pid AND pmrpt_rcptuid = :ref_uid;

SELECT pmrpt_eid as pmrid, pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp as ptm, pmrpt_datepull_tstamp as tm_pull, pmrpt_datergr_tstamp as tm_rgr, pmrpt_datevstd_tstamp as tm_vstd, pdaccid as act_uid, pdacc_eid as act_ueid, pdacc_ufn as act_ufn, pdacc_upsd as act_upsd, UALL2.uat_eid as wha, UALL1.uat_eid as pmr_wha, reactid as mst, react_eid as mst_eid, '' as mst_prmlkid, artid as slv, art_eid as slv_eid, art_prmlk as slv_prmlkid, react_date_tstamp as tm, prt_lib as pmr_tp FROM Postman_Reports, Postman_Report_Types, UAL_ActionTypes UALL1, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN UAL_ActionTypes UALL2 ON ualg_uatid = UALL2.uat_id INNER JOIN Reactions ON reactid = ualg_refobj INNER JOIN Articles ON react_artid = artid INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts ON react_writer = pdaccid WHERE pmrpt_type = prt_id AND pmrpt_uatid = UALL1.uat_id AND pmrpt_ualgid = ualgid AND pdacc_todelete = 0 AND pmrpt_id = :id

SELECT pmrpt_eid as pmrid, pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp as ptm, pmrpt_datepull_tstamp as tm_pull, pmrpt_datergr_tstamp as tm_rgr, pmrpt_datevstd_tstamp as tm_vstd, pdaccid as act_uid, pdacc_eid as act_ueid, pdacc_ufn as act_ufn, pdacc_upsd as act_upsd, UALL2.uat_eid as wha, UALL1.uat_eid as pmr_wha, tbevlid as mst, '' as mst_eid, '' as mst_prmlkid, artid as slv, art_eid as slv_eid, art_prmlk as slv_prmlkid, pdevt_datecrea_tstamp as tm, prt_lib as pmr_tp, tbevl_evltpid evtp FROM Postman_Reports, Postman_Report_Types, UAL_ActionTypes UALL1, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN UAL_ActionTypes UALL2 ON ualg_uatid = UALL2.uat_id INNER JOIN Table_Evals ON tbevlid = ualg_refobj INNER JOIN Prod_Events ON tbevl_start_evtid = pdevtid INNER JOIN Articles ON tbevl_artid = artid INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts ON pdevt_acc_actor = pdaccid WHERE pmrpt_type = prt_id AND pmrpt_uatid = UALL1.uat_id AND pmrpt_ualgid = ualgid AND pdacc_todelete = 0 AND pmrpt_id = :id

SELECT pmrpt_eid as pmrid, pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp as ptm, pmrpt_datepull_tstamp as tm_pull, pmrpt_datergr_tstamp as tm_rgr, pmrpt_datevstd_tstamp as tm_vstd, pdaccid as act_uid, pdacc_eid as act_ueid, pdacc_ufn as act_ufn, pdacc_upsd as act_upsd, UALL2.uat_eid as wha, UALL1.uat_eid as pmr_wha, ustg_id as mst, ustg_eid as mst_eid, '' as mst_prmlkid, artid as slv, art_eid as slv_eid, art_prmlk as slv_prmlkid, ustg_datecrea_tstamp as tm, prt_lib as pmr_tp FROM Postman_Reports, Postman_Report_Types, UAL_ActionTypes UALL1, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN UAL_ActionTypes UALL2 ON ualg_uatid = UALL2.uat_id INNER JOIN USTGs_ARTICLE ON ustgart_ustgid = ualg_refobj INNER JOIN USERTAGs ON ustg_id = ustgart_ustgid INNER JOIN Articles ON ustgart_artid = artid INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts ON art_accid = pdaccid WHERE pmrpt_type = prt_id AND pmrpt_uatid = UALL1.uat_id AND pmrpt_ualgid = ualgid AND pdacc_todelete = 0 AND pmrpt_id = :id

SELECT pmrpt_eid as pmrid, pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp as ptm, pmrpt_datepull_tstamp as tm_pull, pmrpt_datergr_tstamp as tm_rgr, pmrpt_datevstd_tstamp as tm_vstd, pdaccid as act_uid, pdacc_eid as act_ueid, pdacc_ufn as act_ufn, pdacc_upsd as act_upsd, UALL2.uat_eid as wha, UALL1.uat_eid as pmr_wha, ustg_id as mst, ustg_eid as mst_eid, '' as mst_prmlkid, reactid as slv, react_eid as slv_eid, '' as slv_prmlkid, ustg_datecrea_tstamp as tm, prt_lib as pmr_tp, artid as slvl1, art_eid as slvl1_eid, art_accid as slvl1_oid, art_prmlk as slvl1_prmlkid, art_cdate_tstamp as slvl1_tm FROM Postman_Reports, Postman_Report_Types, UAL_ActionTypes UALL1, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN UAL_ActionTypes UALL2 ON ualg_uatid = UALL2.uat_id INNER JOIN USTGs_REACTION ON ustgrct_ustgid = ualg_refobj INNER JOIN USERTAGs ON ustg_id = ustgrct_ustgid INNER JOIN Reactions ON ustgrct_rctid = reactid INNER JOIN Articles ON react_artid = artid INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts ON react_writer = pdaccid WHERE pmrpt_type = prt_id AND pmrpt_uatid = UALL1.uat_id AND pmrpt_ualgid = ualgid AND pdacc_todelete = 0 AND pmrpt_id = :id

SELECT pmrpt_eid as pmrid, pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp as ptm, pmrpt_datepull_tstamp as tm_pull, pmrpt_datergr_tstamp as tm_rgr, pmrpt_datevstd_tstamp as tm_vstd,
pdaccid as act_uid, pdacc_eid as act_ueid, pdacc_ufn as act_ufn, pdacc_upsd as act_upsd,
UALL2.uat_eid as wha, UALL1.uat_eid as pmr_wha,
ustg_id as mst, ustg_eid as mst_eid, '' as mst_prmlkid, tstid as slv, tst_eid as slv_eid, '' as slv_prmlkid, ustg_datecrea_tstamp as tm, prt_lib as pmr_tp
FROM Postman_Reports, Postman_Report_Types, UAL_ActionTypes UALL1, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN UAL_ActionTypes UALL2 ON ualg_uatid = UALL2.uat_id INNER JOIN USTGs_TESTY ON ustgtst_ustgid = ualg_refobj INNER JOIN USERTAGs ON ustg_id = ustgtst_ustgid INNER JOIN TESTIES ON ustgtst_tstid = tstid INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts ON tst_ouid = pdaccid WHERE pmrpt_type = prt_id AND pmrpt_uatid = UALL1.uat_id AND pmrpt_ualgid = ualgid AND pdacc_todelete = 0 AND pmrpt_id = :id

SELECT pmrpt_eid as pmrid, pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp as ptm, pmrpt_datepull_tstamp as tm_pull, pmrpt_datergr_tstamp as tm_rgr, pmrpt_datevstd_tstamp as tm_vstd,
pdaccid as act_uid, pdacc_eid as act_ueid, pdacc_ufn as act_ufn, pdacc_upsd as act_upsd,
UALL2.uat_eid as wha, UALL1.uat_eid as pmr_wha,
ustg_id as mst, ustg_eid as mst_eid, '' as mst_prmlkid, tsrcid as slv, '' as slv_eid, '' as slv_prmlkid, ustg_datecrea_tstamp as tm, prt_lib as pmr_tp,
tstid as slvl1, tst_eid as slvl1_eid, tst_ouid as slvl1_oid, '' as slvl1_prmlkid, tst_adddate_tstamp as slvl1_tm
FROM Postman_Reports, Postman_Report_Types, UAL_ActionTypes UALL1, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN UAL_ActionTypes UALL2 ON ualg_uatid = UALL2.uat_id INNER JOIN USTGs_PDREACT ON ustgpdr_ustgid = ualg_refobj INNER JOIN USERTAGs ON ustg_id = ustgpdr_ustgid INNER JOIN PRODDB_REACTIONS ON pdrct_id = ustgpdr_pdrid INNER JOIN TESTY_REACTIONS ON tsrc_pdrid = pdrct_id INNER JOIN TESTIES ON tsrc_tstid = tstid INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts ON pdrct_author = pdaccid WHERE pmrpt_type = prt_id AND pmrpt_uatid = UALL1.uat_id AND pmrpt_ualgid = ualgid AND pdacc_todelete = 0 AND pmrpt_id = :id

SELECT pmrpt_eid as pmrid, pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp as ptm, pmrpt_datepull_tstamp as tm_pull, pmrpt_datergr_tstamp as tm_rgr, pmrpt_datevstd_tstamp as tm_vstd,
pdaccid as act_uid, pdacc_eid as act_ueid, pdacc_ufn as act_ufn, pdacc_upsd as act_upsd,
UALL2.uat_eid as wha, UALL1.uat_eid as pmr_wha,
tstid as mst, tst_eid as mst_eid, '' as mst_prmlkid, '' as slv, '' as slv_eid, '' as slv_prmlkid, tst_adddate_tstamp as tm, prt_lib as pmr_tp
FROM Postman_Reports, Postman_Report_Types, UAL_ActionTypes UALL1, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN UAL_ActionTypes UALL2 ON ualg_uatid = UALL2.uat_id INNER JOIN Testies ON tstid = ualg_refobj INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts ON tst_ouid = pdaccid
WHERE pmrpt_type = prt_id AND pmrpt_uatid = UALL1.uat_id AND pmrpt_ualgid = ualgid AND pdacc_todelete = 0 AND pmrpt_id = :id

SELECT pmrpt_eid as pmrid, pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp as ptm, pmrpt_datepull_tstamp as tm_pull, pmrpt_datergr_tstamp as tm_rgr, pmrpt_datevstd_tstamp as tm_vstd,
pdaccid as act_uid, pdacc_eid as act_ueid, pdacc_ufn as act_ufn, pdacc_upsd as act_upsd,
UALL2.uat_eid as wha, UALL1.uat_eid as pmr_wha,
pdrct_id as mst, pdrct_eid as mst_eid, '' as mst_prmlkid, tstid as slv, tst_eid as slv_eid, '' as slv_prmlkid, pdrct_dcrea_tstamp as tm, prt_lib as pmr_tp
FROM Postman_Reports, Postman_Report_Types, UAL_ActionTypes UALL1, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN UAL_ActionTypes UALL2 ON ualg_uatid = UALL2.uat_id INNER JOIN TESTY_REACTIONS ON tsrcid = ualg_refobj INNER JOIN TESTIES ON tstid = tsrc_tstid INNER JOIN PRODDB_REACTIONS ON pdrct_id = tsrc_pdrid INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts ON pdrct_author = pdaccid
WHERE pmrpt_type = prt_id AND pmrpt_uatid = UALL1.uat_id AND pmrpt_ualgid = ualgid AND pdacc_todelete = 0 AND pmrpt_id = :id

SELECT pmrpt_eid as pmrid, pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp as ptm, pmrpt_datepull_tstamp as tm_pull, pmrpt_datergr_tstamp as tm_rgr, pmrpt_datevstd_tstamp as tm_vstd,
pdaccid as act_uid, pdacc_eid as act_ueid, pdacc_ufn as act_ufn, pdacc_upsd as act_upsd,
UALL2.uat_eid as wha, UALL1.uat_eid as pmr_wha,
tlkh_id as mst, '' as mst_eid, '' as mst_prmlkid, tstid as slv, tst_eid as slv_eid, '' as slv_prmlkid, tlkh_startdate_tstamp as tm, prt_lib as pmr_tp
FROM Postman_Reports, Postman_Report_Types, UAL_ActionTypes UALL1, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN UAL_ActionTypes UALL2 ON ualg_uatid = UALL2.uat_id INNER JOIN TESTY_LIKES_HISTY ON tlkh_id = ualg_refobj INNER JOIN TESTIES ON tstid = tlkh_tstid INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts ON tlkh_accid = pdaccid
WHERE pmrpt_type = prt_id AND pmrpt_uatid = UALL1.uat_id AND pmrpt_ualgid = ualgid AND pdacc_todelete = 0 AND pmrpt_id = :id

SELECT pmrpt_eid as pmrid, pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp as ptm, pmrpt_datepull_tstamp as tm_pull, pmrpt_datergr_tstamp as tm_rgr, pmrpt_datevstd_tstamp as tm_vstd,
pdaccid as act_uid, pdacc_eid as act_ueid, pdacc_ufn as act_ufn, pdacc_upsd as act_upsd,
UALL2.uat_eid as wha, UALL1.uat_eid as pmr_wha,
tbrel_id as mst, '' as mst_eid, '' as mst_prmlkid, tbrel_acc_targ as slv, '' as slv_eid, '' as slv_prmlkid, tbrel_datecrea_tstamp as tm, prt_lib as pmr_tp
FROM Postman_Reports, Postman_Report_Types, UAL_ActionTypes UALL1, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN UAL_ActionTypes UALL2 ON ualg_uatid = UALL2.uat_id INNER JOIN TABLERELATIONS ON tbrel_id = ualg_refobj INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts ON tbrel_acc_actor = pdaccid
WHERE pmrpt_type = prt_id AND pmrpt_uatid = UALL1.uat_id AND pmrpt_ualgid = ualgid AND pdacc_todelete = 0 AND pmrpt_id = :id

SELECT pmrpt_eid as pmrid, pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp as ptm, pmrpt_datepull_tstamp as tm_pull, pmrpt_datergr_tstamp as tm_rgr, pmrpt_datevstd_tstamp as tm_vstd,
pdaccid as act_uid, pdacc_eid as act_ueid, pdacc_ufn as act_ufn, pdacc_upsd as act_upsd,
UALL2.uat_eid as wha, UALL1.uat_eid as pmr_wha,
traboid as mst, '' as mst_eid, '' as mst_prmlkid, trid as slv, trd_eid as slv_eid, '' as slv_prmlkid, trabo_datecrea_tstamp as tm, prt_lib as pmr_tp
FROM Postman_Reports, Postman_Report_Types, UAL_ActionTypes UALL1, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN UAL_ActionTypes UALL2 ON ualg_uatid = UALL2.uat_id INNER JOIN TRABO_HISTY ON traboid = ualg_refobj INNER JOIN TRENDS ON trabo_trid = trid INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts ON trabo_follower = pdaccid
WHERE pmrpt_type = prt_id AND pmrpt_uatid = UALL1.uat_id AND pmrpt_ualgid = ualgid AND pdacc_todelete = 0 AND pmrpt_id = :id

SELECT pmrpt_eid as pmrid, pmrpt_datecrea_tstamp as ptm, pmrpt_datepull_tstamp as tm_pull, pmrpt_datergr_tstamp as tm_rgr, pmrpt_datevstd_tstamp as tm_vstd,
pdaccid as act_uid, pdacc_eid as act_ueid, pdacc_ufn as act_ufn, pdacc_upsd as act_upsd,
UALL2.uat_eid as wha, UALL1.uat_eid as pmr_wha,
arfv_id as mst, '' as mst_eid, '' as mst_prmlkid, artid as slv, art_eid as slv_eid, art_prmlk as slv_prmlkid, arfv_startdate_tstamp as tm, prt_lib as pmr_tp,
ualg_refobj_lib fvtp
FROM Postman_Reports, Postman_Report_Types, UAL_ActionTypes UALL1, UserActyLogs INNER JOIN UAL_ActionTypes UALL2 ON ualg_uatid = UALL2.uat_id INNER JOIN ARTICLES_FAVORITE_HISTY ON arfv_id = ualg_refobj INNER JOIN ARTICLES ON artid = arfv_artid INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts ON arfv_accid = pdaccid
WHERE pmrpt_type = prt_id AND pmrpt_uatid = UALL1.uat_id AND pmrpt_ualgid = ualgid AND pdacc_todelete = 0 AND pmrpt_id = :id

DELETE USTGs_ABME_INTRO, USERTAGs FROM USTGs_ABME_INTRO, USERTAGs WHERE ustgabmi_ustgid = ustg_id AND ustgabmi_abmid = :abmid;

SELECT * FROM Proddb_Accounts WHERE pdaccid != :cuid1 AND pdaccid NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid2 THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid3 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid4 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 2 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid5 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid6 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 1 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid7 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid8 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 4 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid9 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid10 ) ) ) AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) AND pdacc_todelete = 0 AND pdacc_datecrea_tstamp >= :time ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT :limit;

query.body.value: SELECT * FROM Articles WHERE art_accid != :cuid1 AND ( art_accid IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid2 THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid3 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid4 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 2 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid5 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid6 ) ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) OR artid IN ( SELECT artid FROM VM_Articles_ITR WHERE art_todel = 0 ) ) AND artid NOT IN ( SELECT artid FROM VM_Articles_IML WHERE art_todel = 1 ) AND artid NOT IN ( SELECT artid FROM VM_Articles_ITR WHERE art_todel = 1 ) AND art_cdate_tstamp >= :time ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT :limit;

query.body.value: SELECT * FROM Trends WHERE trid NOT IN ( SELECT trid FROM Trends WHERE trd_owner = :cuid1 ) AND trd_owner NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid2 THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid3 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid4 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 2 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid5 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid6 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 1 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid7 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid8 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 4 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid9 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid10 ) ) ) AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) AND trd_next_del_tstamp IS NULL ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT :limit;

query.body.value: SELECT * FROM Articles WHERE ( art_accid IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid2 THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid3 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid4 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 2 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid5 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid6 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 1 AND tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid7 ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) OR artid IN ( SELECT trid FROM Trends WHERE trd_owner = :cuid1 ) ) AND art_accid IN ( SELECT sugg_ngl_pfl_uid FROM SUGG_ANGELS_PFLS ) AND artid NOT IN ( SELECT artid FROM VM_Articles_IML WHERE art_todel = 1 ) AND artid NOT IN ( SELECT artid FROM VM_Articles_ITR WHERE art_todel = 1 ) AND art_accid != :cuid8 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT :limit;

query.body.value: SELECT AR.*, 'react' as case_type, react_eid case_eid, react_date_tstamp case_date FROM Reactions , Articles AR WHERE react_artid = artid AND react_writer = :uid AND artid IN ( SELECT trart_artid FROM TrArticles ) ORDER BY react_date_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT AR.*, 'react' as case_type, react_eid case_eid, react_date_tstamp case_date FROM Reactions , Articles AR LEFT JOIN ArtStatesHisty ASH ON ash_aid = artid WHERE react_artid = artid AND react_writer = :uid AND ( artid IN ( SELECT trart_artid FROM TrArticles ) OR art_is_sod = 1 ) AND ( ash_state IS NULL OR ash_state IN (1,6) ) ORDER BY react_date_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT AR.*, 'react' as case_type, react_eid case_eid, react_date_tstamp case_date FROM Reactions , Articles AR WHERE react_artid = artid AND react_writer = :tguid AND ( artid IN ( SELECT trart_artid FROM TrArticles ) OR ( art_accid = :tguid1 OR art_accid IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid1 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid2 ) ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) ) ) ORDER BY react_date_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

query.body.value: SELECT AR.*, 'react' as case_type, react_eid case_eid, react_date_tstamp case_date FROM Reactions , Articles AR LEFT JOIN ArtStatesHisty ASH ON ash_aid = artid WHERE react_artid = artid AND react_writer = :tguid AND ( artid IN ( SELECT trart_artid FROM TrArticles ) OR ( /* IML_FRD */ art_is_hstd = 0 AND ( art_accid = :tguid1 OR art_accid IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid1 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid2 ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) OR art_accid = :cuid3 ) /* IML_HOSTED */ OR ( art_is_hstd = 1 AND art_accid = :cuid4 ) ) OR art_is_sod = 1 ) AND ( ash_state IS NULL OR ash_state IN (1,6) ) ORDER BY react_date_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

query.body.value: SELECT AR.*, 'react' as case_type, react_eid case_eid, react_date_tstamp case_date, react_writer case_aid, pdacc_eid case_aeid, pdacc_ufn case_afn, pdacc_upsd case_apsd FROM Reactions, Proddb_Accounts, Articles AR WHERE react_writer = pdaccid AND react_artid = artid /* Acteur de mon reseau */ AND react_writer IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid1 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid2 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 2 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid3 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid4 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 1 AND tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid5 ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) AND ( /* Article est une Tendance */ artid IN ( SELECT trart_artid FROM TrArticles ) /* Auteur de l'article est un ami */ OR art_accid IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid6 THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid7 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid8 ) ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) ) ORDER BY react_date_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

query.note.value: Commentaires d'une personne de mon réseau où l'article est TRD OU où le propriétaire est un de mes amis

query.body.value: SELECT AR.*, 'react' as case_type, react_eid case_eid, react_date_tstamp case_date, react_writer case_aid, pdacc_eid case_aeid, pdacc_ufn case_afn, pdacc_upsd case_apsd FROM Reactions, Proddb_Accounts, Articles AR LEFT JOIN ArtStatesHisty ASH ON ash_aid = artid WHERE react_writer = pdaccid AND react_artid = artid /* M'EXCLURE des OWNERS d'Article */ AND art_accid != :cuid9 /* Acteur de mon reseau */ AND react_writer IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid1 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid2 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 2 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid3 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid4 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 1 AND tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid5 ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) AND ( /* Article est une Tendance */ artid IN ( SELECT trart_artid FROM TrArticles ) /* Auteur de l'article est un ami */ OR art_accid IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid6 THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid7 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid8 ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) OR art_is_sod = 1 ) AND art_is_hstd = 0 AND ( ash_state IS NULL OR ash_state IN (1,6) ) ORDER BY react_date_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

query.body.value: SELECT AR.*, 'react' as case_type, react_eid case_eid, react_date_tstamp case_date, react_writer case_aid, pdacc_eid case_aeid, pdacc_ufn case_afn, pdacc_upsd case_apsd FROM Reactions, Proddb_Accounts, Articles AR LEFT JOIN ArtStatesHisty ASH ON ash_aid = artid WHERE react_writer = pdaccid AND react_artid = artid /* M'EXCLURE des Auteurs d'Article */ AND art_accid != :cuid9 /* Acteur de mon reseau */ AND react_writer IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid1 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid2 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 2 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid3 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid4 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 1 AND tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid5 ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) AND ( /* Article est une Tendance */ artid IN ( SELECT trart_artid FROM TrArticles ) /* Auteur de l'article est un ami */ OR art_accid IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid6 THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid7 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid8 ) ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) OR art_is_sod = 1 ) AND art_is_hstd = 0 AND ( ash_state IS NULL OR ash_state IN (1,6) ) AND react_eid != :refid AND react_date_tstamp >= :reftm ORDER BY react_date_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

query.body.value: SELECT AR.*, 'eval' as case_type, NULL case_eid, pdevt_datecrea_tstamp case_date, pdevt_acc_actor case_aid, pdacc_eid case_aeid, pdacc_ufn case_afn, pdacc_upsd case_apsd FROM Table_Evals, Prod_Events, Proddb_Accounts, Articles AR WHERE tbevl_start_evtid = pdevtid AND pdevt_acc_actor = pdaccid AND tbevl_artid = artid AND tbevl_end_evtid IS NULL AND tbevl_evltpid NOT IN (4) AND is_autobuild = 0 /* Acteur de mon reseau */ AND pdevt_acc_actor IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid1 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid2 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 2 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid3 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid4 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 1 AND tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid5 ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) AND ( /* Article est une Tendance */ artid IN ( SELECT trart_artid FROM TrArticles ) OR art_accid IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid6 THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( /* Auteur de l'article est un ami OU Auteur de l'article est un DFOLW et eval est COOL */ ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid7 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid8 ) ) OR ( ( tbrel_relsts = 2 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid9 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid10 ) ) AND tbevl_evltpid = 2 ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) ) ORDER BY pdevt_datecrea_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

query.body.value: SELECT AR.*, 'fav' as case_type, arfv_eid case_eid, arfv_startdate_tstamp case_date, pdaccid case_aid, pdacc_eid case_aeid, pdacc_ufn case_afn, pdacc_upsd case_apsd FROM Articles_Favorite_Histy, Proddb_Accounts PA, Articles AR LEFT JOIN ArtStatesHisty ASH ON ash_aid = artid WHERE arfv_artid = artid AND arfv_accid = pdaccid /* M'EXCLURE des Auteurs d'Article */ AND art_accid != :cuid9 /* Acteur de mon reseau */ AND arfv_accid IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid1 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid2 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 2 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid3 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid4 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 1 AND tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid5 ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) AND ( /* Article est une Tendance */ artid IN ( SELECT trart_artid FROM TrArticles ) /* Auteur de l'article est un ami */ OR art_accid IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid6 THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid7 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid8 ) ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) OR art_is_sod = 1 ) AND art_is_hstd = 0 AND arfv_fvtid = 1 AND ( ash_state IS NULL OR ash_state IN (1,6) ) AND arfv_eid != :refid AND arfv_startdate_tstamp >= :reftm ORDER BY arfv_startdate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

query.body.value: SELECT TST.*, 'tsm' as case_type, tst_eid case_eid, tst_adddate_tstamp case_date, pdaccid case_aid, pdacc_eid case_aeid, pdacc_ufn case_afn, pdacc_upsd case_apsd FROM Testies TST, Proddb_Accounts PA WHERE tst_ouid = pdaccid /* Pas ses propres éléments */ AND tst_ouid != :cuid /* Pas quand je suis la cible, POSTMAN s'en charge */ AND tst_tguid != :cuid1 /* Ne fait pas partie des interdits de WCNTSEE */ AND :cuid2 NOT IN ( SELECT tcdf_tguid FROM TESTY_CONF_DENY_FOR WHERE tcdf_ini_type = 2 AND tcdf_acuid = tst_ouid AND tcdf_end_tstamp IS NULL ) /* ACTEUR de mon Réseau */ AND tst_ouid IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid3 THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid4 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid5 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 2 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid6 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid7 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 1 AND tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid8 ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) ORDER BY tst_adddate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

query.note.value: Testies d'une personne de mon réseau

query.body.value: SELECT TST.*, 'tsm' as case_type, tst_eid case_eid, tst_adddate_tstamp case_date, pdaccid case_aid, pdacc_eid case_aeid, pdacc_ufn case_afn, pdacc_upsd case_apsd FROM Testies TST, Proddb_Accounts PA WHERE tst_ouid = pdaccid /* Pas ses propres éléments */ AND tst_ouid != :cuid /* Pas quand je suis la cible, POSTMAN s'en charge */ AND tst_tguid != :cuid1 /* Ne fait pas partie des interdits de WCNTSEE */ AND :cuid2 NOT IN ( SELECT tcdf_tguid FROM TESTY_CONF_DENY_FOR WHERE tcdf_ini_type = 2 AND tcdf_acuid = tst_ouid AND tcdf_end_tstamp IS NULL ) /* ACTEUR de mon Réseau */ AND tst_ouid IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid3 THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid4 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid5 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 2 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid6 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid7 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 1 AND tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid8 ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) AND tst_eid != :refid AND tst_adddate_tstamp >= :reftm ORDER BY tst_adddate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

query.body.value: SELECT TST.*, 'tsr' as case_type, pdrct_eid case_eid, pdrct_dcrea_tstamp case_date, pdaccid case_aid, pdacc_eid case_aeid, pdacc_ufn case_afn, pdacc_upsd case_apsd FROM Testy_Reactions TSR, Proddb_Reactions PR, Proddb_Accounts PA, Testies TST WHERE tsrc_pdrid = pdrct_id AND pdrct_author = pdaccid AND tsrc_tstid = tstid /* Pas ses propres éléments */ AND pdrct_author != :cuid /* Pas sur ses propres TESTIES, POSTMAN s'en charge */ AND tst_ouid != :cuid1 /* Ne fait pas partie des interdits de WCNTSEE */ AND :cuid2 NOT IN ( SELECT tcdf_tguid FROM TESTY_CONF_DENY_FOR WHERE tcdf_ini_type = 2 AND tcdf_acuid = tst_ouid AND tcdf_end_tstamp IS NULL ) /* ACTEUR de mon Réseau */ AND pdrct_author IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid3 THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid4 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid5 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 2 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid6 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid7 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 1 AND tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid8 ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) ORDER BY pdrct_dcrea_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

query.body.value: SELECT TST.*, 'tsl' as case_type, tlkh_id case_id, '' case_eid, tlkh_startdate_tstamp case_date, pdaccid case_aid, pdacc_eid case_aeid, pdacc_ufn case_afn, pdacc_upsd case_apsd FROM Testy_Likes_Histy TSL, Testies TST, Proddb_Accounts PA WHERE tlkh_tstid = tstid AND tlkh_accid = pdaccid /* Pas ses propres éléments */ AND tlkh_accid != :cuid /* Pas sur ses propres TESTIES car POSTMAN s'en charge */ AND tst_ouid != :cuid1 /* Ne fait pas partie des interdits de WCNTSEE */ AND :cuid2 NOT IN ( SELECT tcdf_tguid FROM TESTY_CONF_DENY_FOR WHERE tcdf_ini_type = 2 AND tcdf_acuid = tst_ouid AND tcdf_end_tstamp IS NULL ) /* ACTEUR de mon Réseau */ AND tlkh_accid IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid3 THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid4 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid5 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 2 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid6 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid7 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 1 AND tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid8 ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) AND tlkh_taxtid IN (1) AND tlkh_enddate_tstamp IS NULL ORDER BY tlkh_startdate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

query.body.value: INSERT INTO prod_stats_acc_active (p_s_acc_atv_count,p_s_acc_atv_datecrea,p_s_acc_atv_datecrea_tstamp) SELECT count(*) as total, :datecrea, :tstamp FROM proddb_accounts WHERE ( pdaccid IN ( SELECT art_accid FROM articles ) OR pdaccid IN ( SELECT react_writer FROM reactions ) OR pdaccid IN ( SELECT pdevt_acc_actor FROM prod_events WHERE pdevt_ev_type IN (9,10,11,12,13,14) ) );

INSERT INTO prod_stats_acc_zmb (p_s_acc_zmb_count,p_s_acc_zmb_datecrea,p_s_acc_zmb_datecrea_tstamp) SELECT count(*) as total, :datecrea, :tstamp FROM proddb_accounts WHERE ( pdaccid NOT IN ( SELECT art_accid FROM articles ) AND pdaccid NOT IN ( SELECT react_writer FROM reactions ) AND pdaccid NOT IN ( SELECT pdevt_acc_actor FROM prod_events WHERE pdevt_ev_type IN (9,10,11,12,13,14) ) );
INSERT INTO prod_stats_acc_dead (p_s_acc_dead_count,p_s_acc_dead_datecrea,p_s_acc_dead_datecrea_tstamp) SELECT count(*) as total, :datecrea, :tstamp FROM proddb_accounts WHERE pdacc_todelete = 1;

INSERT INTO prod_stats_trd_active (p_s_trd_atv_count,p_s_trd_atv_datecrea,p_s_trd_atv_datecrea_tstamp) SELECT count(*) as total, :datecrea, :tstamp FROM trends WHERE trid IN ( SELECT trart_trid FROM trarticles );

INSERT INTO prod_stats_trd_zmb (p_s_trd_zmb_count,p_s_trd_zmb_datecrea,p_s_trd_zmb_datecrea_tstamp) SELECT count(*) as total, :datecrea, :tstamp FROM trends WHERE trid NOT IN ( SELECT trart_trid FROM trarticles );

INSERT INTO prod_stats_trd_dead (p_s_trd_dead_count,p_s_trd_dead_datecrea,p_s_trd_dead_datecrea_tstamp) SELECT count(*) as total, :datecrea, :tstamp FROM trends WHERE trid IN ( SELECT tsh_trid FROM trstateshisty WHERE tsh_state = 3 ) ;

INSERT INTO prod_stats_evals_active (p_s_evl_actv_count,p_s_evl_actv_datecrea,p_s_evl_actv_datecrea_tstamp) SELECT count(*) as total, :datecrea, :tstamp FROM table_evals WHERE tbevl_end_evtid IS NULL;
INSERT INTO prod_stats_mi (p_s_mi_count,p_s_mi_datecrea,p_s_mi_datecrea_tstamp) SELECT count(*) as total, :datecrea, :tstamp FROM chatbox_messages WHERE chmsg_nxtdldate_tstamp IS NULL;

INSERT INTO prod_stats_mi_miorphans (p_s_mi_miorph_count,p_s_mi_miorph_datecrea,p_s_mi_miorph_datecrea_tstamp) SELECT count(*) as total, :datecrea, :tstamp FROM chatbox_messages WHERE chmsg_nxtdldate_tstamp IS NULL AND ( chmsg_ad_date_tstamp IS NOT NULL OR chmsg_td_date_tstamp IS NOT NULL );
INSERT INTO prod_stats_rel (p_s_rel_count,p_s_rel_datecrea,p_s_rel_datecrea_tstamp) SELECT count(*) as total, :datecrea, :tstamp FROM tablerelations WHERE tbrel_dateend_tstamp IS NULL;

INSERT INTO prod_stats_rel_frds (p_s_rel_frds_count,p_s_rel_frds_datecrea,p_s_rel_frds_datecrea_tstamp) SELECT count(*) as total, :datecrea, :tstamp FROM tablerelations WHERE tbrel_dateend_tstamp IS NULL AND tbrel_relsts = 3;

INSERT INTO prod_stats_rel_sfolw (p_s_rel_sfolw_count,p_s_rel_sfolw_datecrea,p_s_rel_sfolw_datecrea_tstamp) SELECT count(*) as total, :datecrea, :tstamp FROM tablerelations WHERE tbrel_dateend_tstamp IS NULL AND tbrel_relsts = 1;

INSERT INTO prod_stats_rel_dfolw (p_s_rel_dfolw_count,p_s_rel_dfolw_datecrea,p_s_rel_dfolw_datecrea_tstamp) SELECT count(*) as total, :datecrea, :tstamp FROM tablerelations WHERE tbrel_dateend_tstamp IS NULL AND tbrel_relsts = 2;

INSERT INTO prod_stats_rel_void (p_s_rel_void_count,p_s_rel_void_datecrea,p_s_rel_void_datecrea_tstamp) SELECT count(*) as total, :datecrea, :tstamp FROM tablerelations WHERE tbrel_dateend_tstamp IS NULL AND tbrel_relsts = 4;

SELECT * FROM TAPP_FVLK_FAVS WHERE fvlk_fav_ownr = :accid AND fvlk_fav_catg = :fav_catg ORDER BY fvlk_fav_adddate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

UPDATE TESTY_CONF_DENY_FOR SET tcdf_end_date = :date, tcdf_end_tstamp = :tstamp, tcdf_end_locip = :locip, tcdf_end_ssid = :ssid, tcdf_end_uagnt = :uagnt WHERE tcdf_id = :tcdfid;

( SELECT * FROM TESTY_CONF_DENY_FOR WHERE tcdf_acuid = :uid1 AND tcdf_end_tstamp IS NULL ) UNION ( SELECT * FROM TESTY_CONF_DENY_FOR WHERE tcdf_tguid IN ( SELECT DISTINCT tcdf_tguid FROM TESTY_CONF_DENY_FOR WHERE tcdf_acuid = :uid2 AND tcdf_end_tstamp IS NOT NULL ) AND tcdf_end_tstamp IS NULL ) ;

SELECT * FROM TESTY_LIKES_HISTY WHERE tlkh_tstid = :tstid AND tlkh_id != :refid AND tlkh_startdate_tstamp >= :reftm AND tlkh_taxtid IN (1) AND tlkh_enddate_tstamp IS NULL ORDER BY tlkh_startdate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT * FROM TESTY_LIKES_HISTY WHERE tlkh_tstid = :tstid AND tlkh_id != :refid AND tlkh_startdate_tstamp <= :reftm AND tlkh_taxtid IN (1) AND tlkh_enddate_tstamp IS NULL ORDER BY tlkh_startdate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

INSERT URL_IN_CNTTS (uic_ucid,uic_uceid,uic_uctp,uic_gvnurl,uic_domain,uic_ssid,uic_curl,uic_locip,uic_uagent,uic_adddate,uic_adddate_tstamp) VALUES (:ucid,:uceid,:uctp,:gvnurl,:domain,:ssid,:curl,:locip,:uagnt,:date,:tstamp);

SELECT * FROM URL_IN_CNTTS WHERE uic_uceid = :eid AND uic_uctp = 4;
SELECT * FROM URL_IN_CNTTS INNER JOIN ARTICLES ON artid = uic_ucid WHERE art_eid = uic_uceid AND uic_uceid = :aeid AND uic_uctp IN (1,2) ;

INSERT URL_IN_CNTTS_VISTS (uicv_uicid,uicv_uid,uicv_refr,uicv_ssid,uicv_curl,uicv_locip,uicv_uagent,uicv_adddate,uicv_adddate_tstamp) VALUES (:uicid,:auid,:refr,:ssid,:curl,:locip,:uagnt,:date,:tstamp);
DELETE FROM URL_IN_CNTTS_VISTS WHERE uicv_uicid = :uicid ;

query.note.value: Supprimer toutes les occurrences de visites liées à un UIC

query.body.value: INSERT HSH_IN_CNTTS (hic_hcid,hic_hceid,hic_hctp,hic_ntrhsh,hic_mnihsh,hic_gvnhsh,hic_ssid,hic_curl,hic_locip,hic_uagent,hic_adddate,hic_adddate_tstamp) VALUES (:hcid,:hceid,:hctp,:ntrhsh,:mnihsh,:gvnhsh,:ssid,:curl,:locip,:uagnt,:date,:tstamp);

SELECT hic_eid hid, hic_hcid as cnid, hic_hceid as cneid, hic_adddate_tstamp as time, hic_hctp as type FROM HSH_IN_CNTTS WHERE hic_ntrhsh = :hash AND ( ( hic_hctp = 1 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT artid FROM VM_ARTICLES_IML WHERE ( art_state IS NULL OR art_state IN (1,6) ) ) ) OR ( hic_hctp = 2 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT artid FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR WHERE ( art_state IS NULL OR art_state IN (1,6) ) ) ) OR ( hic_hctp = 3 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT reactid FROM Reactions ) ) OR ( hic_hctp = 4 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT tstid FROM Testies ) ) OR ( hic_hctp = 5 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT chmsgid FROM ChatBox_Messages ) ) ) ORDER BY hic_adddate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT hic_eid hid, hic_hcid as cnid, hic_hceid as cneid, hic_adddate_tstamp as time, hic_hctp as type FROM HSH_IN_CNTTS WHERE hic_ntrhsh = :hash AND ( ( hic_hctp = 1 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT artid FROM VM_ARTICLES_IML WHERE ( art_state IS NULL OR art_state IN (1,6) ) AND ( ( :cuid IS NOT NULL AND art_oid IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid1 THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid2 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid3 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 2 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid4 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid5 ) ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) ) OR art_is_sod = 1 OR art_oid = :cuid6 ) AND art_is_hstd = 0 ) ) OR ( hic_hctp = 2 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT artid FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR WHERE ( art_state IS NULL OR art_state IN (1,6) ) ) ) OR ( hic_hctp = 4 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT tstid FROM Testies ) ) ) ORDER BY hic_adddate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT hic_eid hid, hic_hcid as cnid, hic_hceid as cneid, hic_adddate_tstamp as time, hic_hctp as type FROM HSH_IN_CNTTS WHERE hic_ntrhsh = :hash AND ( ( hic_hctp = 1 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT artid FROM VM_ARTICLES_IML WHERE ( art_state IS NULL OR art_state IN (1,6) ) AND artid = hic_hcid AND art_eid = hic_hceid AND ( ( :cuid IS NOT NULL AND art_oid IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid1 THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid2 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid3 ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) ) OR art_is_sod = 1 OR art_oid = :cuid4 ) AND art_is_hstd = 0 ) ) OR ( hic_hctp = 2 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT artid FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR WHERE ( art_state IS NULL OR art_state IN (1,6) ) AND artid = hic_hcid AND art_eid = hic_hceid ) ) OR ( hic_hctp = 4 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT tstid FROM Testies WHERE tstid = hic_hcid AND tst_eid = hic_hceid ) ) ) ORDER BY hic_adddate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT hic_eid hid, hic_hcid as cnid, hic_hceid as cneid, hic_adddate_tstamp as time, hic_hctp as type FROM HSH_IN_CNTTS WHERE hic_ntrhsh = :hash AND hic_adddate_tstamp >= :pvtm AND hic_eid != :pvid ORDER BY hic_adddate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT hic_eid hid, hic_hcid as cnid, hic_hceid as cneid, hic_adddate_tstamp as time, hic_hctp as type FROM HSH_IN_CNTTS WHERE hic_ntrhsh = :hash AND hic_adddate_tstamp >= :pvtm AND hic_eid != :pvid AND ( ( hic_hctp = 1 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT artid FROM VM_ARTICLES_IML WHERE ( art_state IS NULL OR art_state IN (1,6) ) AND ( ( :cuid IS NOT NULL AND art_oid IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid1 THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid2 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid3 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 2 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid4 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid5 ) ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) ) OR art_is_sod = 1 OR art_oid = :cuid6 ) AND art_is_hstd = 0 ) ) OR ( hic_hctp = 2 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT artid FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR WHERE ( art_state IS NULL OR art_state IN (1,6) ) ) ) OR ( hic_hctp = 4 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT tstid FROM Testies ) ) ) ORDER BY hic_adddate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT hic_eid hid, hic_hcid as cnid, hic_hceid as cneid, hic_adddate_tstamp as time, hic_hctp as type FROM HSH_IN_CNTTS WHERE hic_ntrhsh = :hash AND hic_adddate_tstamp >= :pvtm AND hic_eid != :pvid AND ( ( hic_hctp = 1 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT artid FROM VM_ARTICLES_IML WHERE ( art_state IS NULL OR art_state IN (1,6) ) AND artid = hic_hcid AND art_eid = hic_hceid AND ( ( :cuid IS NOT NULL AND art_oid IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid1 THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid2 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid3 ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) ) OR art_is_sod = 1 OR art_oid = :cuid4 ) AND art_is_hstd = 0 ) ) OR ( hic_hctp = 2 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT artid FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR WHERE ( art_state IS NULL OR art_state IN (1,6) ) AND artid = hic_hcid AND art_eid = hic_hceid ) ) OR ( hic_hctp = 4 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT tstid FROM Testies WHERE tstid = hic_hcid AND tst_eid = hic_hceid ) ) ) ORDER BY hic_adddate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT hic_eid hid, hic_hcid as cnid, hic_hceid as cneid, hic_adddate_tstamp as time, hic_hctp as type FROM HSH_IN_CNTTS WHERE hic_ntrhsh = :hash AND hic_adddate_tstamp <= :pvtm AND hic_eid != :pvid ORDER BY hic_adddate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT hic_eid hid, hic_hcid as cnid, hic_hceid as cneid, hic_adddate_tstamp as time, hic_hctp as type FROM HSH_IN_CNTTS WHERE hic_ntrhsh = :hash AND hic_adddate_tstamp <= :pvtm AND hic_eid != :pvid AND ( ( hic_hctp = 1 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT artid FROM VM_ARTICLES_IML WHERE ( art_state IS NULL OR art_state IN (1,6) ) AND ( ( :cuid IS NOT NULL AND art_oid IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid1 THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid2 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid3 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 2 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid4 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid5 ) ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) ) OR art_is_sod = 1 OR art_oid = :cuid6 ) AND art_is_hstd = 0 ) ) OR ( hic_hctp = 2 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT artid FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR WHERE ( art_state IS NULL OR art_state IN (1,6) ) ) ) OR ( hic_hctp = 4 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT tstid FROM Testies ) ) ) ORDER BY hic_adddate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT hic_eid hid, hic_hcid as cnid, hic_hceid as cneid, hic_adddate_tstamp as time, hic_hctp as type FROM HSH_IN_CNTTS WHERE hic_ntrhsh = :hash AND hic_adddate_tstamp <= :pvtm AND hic_eid != :pvid AND ( ( hic_hctp = 1 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT artid FROM VM_ARTICLES_IML WHERE ( art_state IS NULL OR art_state IN (1,6) ) AND artid = hic_hcid AND art_eid = hic_hceid AND ( ( :cuid IS NOT NULL AND art_oid IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid1 THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid2 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid3 ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) ) OR art_is_sod = 1 OR art_oid = :cuid4 ) AND art_is_hstd = 0 ) ) OR ( hic_hctp = 2 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT artid FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR WHERE ( art_state IS NULL OR art_state IN (1,6) ) AND artid = hic_hcid AND art_eid = hic_hceid ) ) OR ( hic_hctp = 4 AND hic_hcid IN ( SELECT tstid FROM Testies WHERE tstid = hic_hcid AND tst_eid = hic_hceid ) ) ) ORDER BY hic_adddate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT * FROM VM_ARTICLES_IML WHERE artid IN (':ids') AND ( art_oid = :cuid OR art_oid IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid1 THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_Tabrels INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_A ON PA_A.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_actor INNER JOIN Proddb_Accounts PA_T ON PA_T.pdaccid = tbrel_acc_targ WHERE ( ( tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid2 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid3 ) ) OR ( tbrel_relsts = 2 AND ( tbrel_acc_actor = :cuid4 OR tbrel_acc_targ = :cuid5 ) ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL AND PA_A.pdacc_todelete = 0 AND PA_T.pdacc_todelete = 0 ) ) AND ( art_state IS NULL OR art_state IN (1,6) );
SELECT * FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR WHERE artid IN (':ids') AND ( art_state IS NULL OR art_state IN (1,6) );
SELECT * FROM HSH_IN_CNTTS WHERE hic_hceid = :eid AND hic_hctp = 4;

SELECT artid hcid, art_eid hceid, kwlib ntrhsh, kwlib mnihsh, kw_lib_ori gvnhsh, 'ssid_not_before_vb20' as ssid, 'curl_not_before_vb20' as curl, art_loc_numip locip, 'uagent_not_before_vb20' uagnt, art_cdate date, art_cdate_tstamp tstamp, ( CASE WHEN ( artid IN ( SELECT artid FROM VM_Articles_IML ) ) THEN 1 ELSE 2 END ) as hctp FROM Keywords, KwByArt, Articles WHERE kba_kwlib = kwlib AND kba_artid = artid AND art_eid NOT IN ( SELECT hic_hceid FROM HSH_IN_CNTTS WHERE hic_hctp IN (1,2) ) ;
SELECT * FROM HSH_IN_CNTTS WHERE hic_hcid = :aid AND hic_hceid = :aeid AND hic_hctp IN (1,2);
SELECT hic_gvnhsh hash, count(*) cn FROM HSH_IN_CNTTS GROUP BY hic_gvnhsh HAVING count(*) >= :rlvt ORDER BY hic_adddate_tstamp DESC, cn DESC LIMIT :limit;
SELECT hic_gvnhsh hash, count(*) cn FROM HSH_IN_CNTTS GROUP BY hic_gvnhsh HAVING count(*) >= :rlvt ORDER BY cn DESC, hic_adddate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;
SELECT * FROM HSH_IN_CNTTS WHERE hic_hcid = :id AND hic_hceid = :eid AND hic_hctp = 3;
