query.body.value: INSERT INTO Tqr_Videos (vid_eid,vid_fn,vid_string_b64,vid_height,vid_width,vid_size,vid_type,vid_duration,vid_realpath,vid_srvid,vid_date_tstamp) VALUES (:vid_eid,:vid_fn,:vid_string_b64,:vid_height,:vid_width,:vid_size,:vid_type,:vid_duration,:vid_realpath,:vid_srvid,:vid_date_tstamp);
SELECT vid_srvid, srv_name FROM artvideos AV, Tqr_Videos PP, Server_Storage SS WHERE AV.av_pdpicid = PP.pdpicid AND PP.vid_srvid = SS.srvid AND AV.av_artid = :av_artid;

SELECT Tqr_Videos.*, srvid as server_id, srv_name as server_name, srv_fam_lib as server_family FROM Tqr_Videos, server_storage, server_family WHERE vid_srvid = srvid AND srv_fam_id = srv_famid AND vid_eid = :vid_eid;

SELECT Tqr_Videos.*, srvid as server_id, srv_name as server_name, srv_fam_lib as server_family FROM Tqr_Videos, server_storage, server_family WHERE vid_srvid = srvid AND srv_fam_id = srv_famid AND vidid = :vidid;
DELETE FROM Tqr_Videos WHERE vidid = :id ;
SELECT Tqr_Videos.* FROM artvideos, tqr_videos WHERE av_vidid = vidid AND av_artid = :aid ;
INSERT INTO ArtVideos (av_vidid,av_artid) VALUES (:av_vidid,:av_artid);
DELETE FROM ArtVideos WHERE av_vidid = :id ;
SELECT * FROM ArtVideos, Tqr_Videos WHERE av_vidid = vidid AND av_artid = :aid ;
INSERT INTO proddb_reactions (pdrct_text,pdrct_author,pdrct_locip,pdrct_ssid,pdrct_uagnt,pdrct_datecrea,pdrct_dcrea_tstamp) VALUES (:text,:author,:locip,:ssid,:uagnt,:date,:tstamp);
DELETE FROM proddb_reactions WHERE pdrct_id = :id ;

SELECT * FROM ( ( SELECT artid, art_eid, art_picid, art_pic_rpath, art_desc, art_crea_tstamp, art_locip, NULL art_trid, NULL art_trd_eid, NULL art_trd_title, NULL art_trd_desc, NULL art_trd_title_href, NULL art_trd_catgid, NULL art_trd_is_public, NULL art_trd_grat, NULL art_trd_date_tstamp, art_hashs, art_rnb, art_me, art_evals, art_tot, art_oid, art_ogid, art_oeid, art_opsd, art_ofn, art_oppicid, art_oppic_rpath, art_todel, art_state, art_is_sod, art_vid_url FROM VM_ARTICLES_IML ) UNION ( SELECT * FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR ) ) AS U /* COMMON CONSTRAINTS : ALGO */ WHERE ( ( U.art_tot >= :must_lnb AND U.art_rnb >= :must_rnb ) AND ( /* COMMON CONSTRAINTS : MUST EXCLUDE (from) PROFIL */ U.art_oid NOT IN ( SELECT ecexc_refid FROM tia_cover_exclude WHERE ecexc_type IN (5) AND ecexc_dend_tstamp IS NULL ) /* COMMON CONSTRAINTS : MUST EXCLUDE (from) TRD */ AND art_trid NOT IN ( SELECT ecexc_refid FROM tia_cover_exclude WHERE ecexc_type IN (4) AND ecexc_dend_tstamp IS NULL ) ) ) AND ( U.art_is_sod = 1 OR U.art_trid IS NOT NULL OR U.art_oid IN ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN tbrel_acc_actor = :uid1 THEN tbrel_acc_targ ELSE tbrel_acc_actor END ) as uid FROM VM_TABRELS WHERE tbrel_relsts = 3 AND ( ( tbrel_acc_actor = :uid2 AND tbrel_acc_targ = art_oid ) OR ( tbrel_acc_actor = art_oid AND tbrel_acc_targ = :uid3 ) ) AND tbrel_edate_tstamp IS NULL ) IS NOT NULL ) AND U.art_todel = 0 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT :limit ;

SELECT * FROM ( ( SELECT artid, art_eid, art_picid, art_pic_rpath, art_desc, art_crea_tstamp, art_locip, NULL art_trid, NULL art_trd_eid, NULL art_trd_title, NULL art_trd_desc, NULL art_trd_title_href, NULL art_trd_catgid, NULL art_trd_is_public, NULL art_trd_grat, NULL art_trd_date_tstamp, art_hashs, art_rnb, art_me, art_evals, art_tot, art_oid, art_ogid, art_oeid, art_opsd, art_ofn, art_oppicid, art_oppic_rpath, art_todel, art_state, art_is_sod, art_vid_url FROM VM_ARTICLES_IML ) UNION ( SELECT * FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR ) ) AS U /* COMMON CONSTRAINTS : ALGO */ WHERE ( ( U.art_tot >= :must_lnb AND U.art_rnb >= :must_rnb ) AND ( /* COMMON CONSTRAINTS : MUST EXCLUDE (from) PROFIL */ U.art_oid NOT IN ( SELECT ecexc_refid FROM tia_cover_exclude WHERE ecexc_type IN (5) AND ecexc_dend_tstamp IS NULL ) /* COMMON CONSTRAINTS : MUST EXCLUDE (from) TRD */ AND art_trid NOT IN ( SELECT ecexc_refid FROM tia_cover_exclude WHERE ecexc_type IN (4) AND ecexc_dend_tstamp IS NULL ) ) ) AND ( U.art_is_sod = 1 OR U.art_trid IS NOT NULL ) AND U.art_todel = 0 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT :limit ;

INSERT INTO MYSMESSAGES (mysm_text,mysm_locip,mysm_ssid,mysm_uagent,mysm_curl,mysm_reflang,mysm_refcnty,mysm_refcity,mysm_owner,mysm_creadate,mysm_creadate_tstamp) VALUES (:mysm_text,:mysm_locip,:mysm_ssid,:mysm_uagent,:mysm_curl,:mysm_reflang,:mysm_refcnty,:mysm_refcity,:mysm_ouid,:mysm_creadate,:mysm_creadate_tstamp);
DELETE FROM MYSMESSAGES WHERE mysmid = :id ;
DELETE FROM MYSDISCLOSES WHERE mysd_mysmid = :mmid ;

SELECT mysmessages.*, pdaccid mysm_ouid, pdaccid mysm_oueid, pdacc_gid mysm_ougid, pdacc_eid mysm_oueid, pdacc_upsd mysm_oupsd, pdacc_ufn mysm_oufn FROM mysmessages, proddb_accounts WHERE mysm_owner = pdaccid ORDER BY mysm_creadate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT mysmessages.*, pdaccid mysm_ouid, pdaccid mysm_oueid, pdacc_gid mysm_ougid, pdacc_upsd mysm_oupsd, pdacc_ufn mysm_oufn FROM mysmessages, proddb_accounts WHERE mysm_owner = pdaccid AND mysm_eid != :refid AND mysm_creadate_tstamp >= :reftm ORDER BY mysm_creadate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT mysmessages.*, pdaccid mysm_ouid, pdaccid mysm_oueid, pdacc_gid mysm_ougid, pdacc_upsd mysm_oupsd, pdacc_ufn mysm_oufn FROM mysmessages, proddb_accounts WHERE mysm_owner = pdaccid AND mysm_eid != :refid AND mysm_creadate_tstamp <= :reftm ORDER BY mysm_creadate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT IFNULL(sum(mysv_vote),0) as mysm_sumvotes, mysmessages.*, pdaccid mysm_ouid, pdaccid mysm_oueid, pdacc_gid mysm_ougid, pdacc_upsd mysm_oupsd, pdacc_ufn mysm_oufn FROM proddb_accounts, mysmessages LEFT JOIN mysvotes ON mysmid = mysv_mysmid WHERE mysm_owner = pdaccid AND mysv_end_tstamp IS NULL GROUP BY mysmid ORDER BY mysm_sumvotes DESC, mysm_creadate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT IFNULL(sum(mysv_vote),0) as mysm_sumvotes, mysmessages.*, pdaccid mysm_ouid, pdaccid mysm_oueid, pdacc_gid mysm_ougid, pdacc_upsd mysm_oupsd, pdacc_ufn mysm_oufn FROM proddb_accounts, mysmessages LEFT JOIN mysvotes ON mysmid = mysv_mysmid WHERE mysm_owner = pdaccid AND mysm_eid != :refid AND mysv_end_tstamp IS NULL GROUP BY mysmid HAVING mysm_sumvotes <= :refvote ORDER BY mysm_sumvotes DESC, mysm_creadate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT mysmessages.*, pdaccid mysm_ouid, pdaccid mysm_oueid, pdacc_gid mysm_ougid, pdacc_upsd mysm_oupsd, pdacc_ufn mysm_oufn FROM mysmessages, proddb_accounts WHERE mysm_owner = pdaccid AND mysm_creadate_tstamp >= :date_from ORDER BY mysm_creadate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT mysmessages.*, pdaccid mysm_ouid, pdaccid mysm_oueid, pdacc_gid mysm_ougid, pdacc_upsd mysm_oupsd, pdacc_ufn mysm_oufn FROM mysmessages, proddb_accounts WHERE mysm_owner = pdaccid AND mysm_creadate_tstamp >= :date_from AND mysm_eid != :refid AND mysm_creadate_tstamp >= :reftm ORDER BY mysm_creadate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT mysmessages.*, pdaccid mysm_ouid, pdaccid mysm_oueid, pdacc_gid mysm_ougid, pdacc_upsd mysm_oupsd, pdacc_ufn mysm_oufn FROM mysmessages, proddb_accounts WHERE mysm_owner = pdaccid AND mysm_creadate_tstamp >= :date_from AND mysm_eid != :refid AND mysm_creadate_tstamp <= :reftm ORDER BY mysm_creadate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT IFNULL(sum(mysv_vote),0) as mysm_sumvotes, mysmessages.*, pdaccid mysm_ouid, pdaccid mysm_oueid, pdacc_gid mysm_ougid, pdacc_upsd mysm_oupsd, pdacc_ufn mysm_oufn FROM proddb_accounts, mysmessages LEFT JOIN mysvotes ON mysmid = mysv_mysmid WHERE mysm_owner = pdaccid AND mysm_creadate_tstamp >= :date_from AND mysv_end_tstamp IS NULL GROUP BY mysmid ORDER BY mysm_sumvotes DESC, mysm_creadate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT IFNULL(sum(mysv_vote),0) as mysm_sumvotes, mysmessages.*, pdaccid mysm_ouid, pdaccid mysm_oueid, pdacc_gid mysm_ougid, pdacc_upsd mysm_oupsd, pdacc_ufn mysm_oufn FROM proddb_accounts, mysmessages LEFT JOIN mysvotes ON mysmid = mysv_mysmid WHERE mysm_owner = pdaccid AND mysm_creadate_tstamp >= :date_from AND mysm_eid != :refid AND mysv_end_tstamp IS NULL GROUP BY mysmid HAVING mysm_sumvotes <= :refvote ORDER BY mysm_sumvotes DESC, mysm_creadate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT * FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR WHERE art_oid = :uid AND art_eid != :refid AND art_crea_tstamp <= :reftm AND art_todel = 0 ORDER BY art_crea_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;
SELECT * FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR LEFT JOIN TRENDS ON art_trid = trid WHERE art_oid = :uid1 AND trd_owner = :uid2 AND art_todel = 0 ORDER BY art_crea_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT * FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR LEFT JOIN TRENDS ON art_trid = trid WHERE art_oid = :uid1 AND trd_owner = :uid2 AND art_eid != :refid AND art_crea_tstamp <= :reftm AND art_todel = 0 ORDER BY art_crea_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;
SELECT * FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR LEFT JOIN TRENDS ON art_trid = trid WHERE art_oid = :uid1 AND trd_owner != :uid2 AND art_todel = 0 ORDER BY art_crea_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT * FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR LEFT JOIN TRENDS ON art_trid = trid WHERE art_oid = :uid1 AND trd_owner = :uid2 AND art_eid != :refid AND art_crea_tstamp <= :reftm AND art_todel = 0 ORDER BY art_crea_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

( SELECT artid, art_eid, art_picid, art_pic_rpath, art_desc, art_crea_tstamp, art_locip, NULL art_trid, NULL art_trd_eid, NULL art_trd_title, NULL art_trd_desc, NULL art_trd_title_href, NULL art_trd_catgid, NULL art_trd_is_public, NULL art_trd_grat, NULL art_trd_date_tstamp, art_hashs, art_rnb, art_me, art_evals, art_tot, art_oid, art_ogid, art_oeid, art_opsd, art_ofn, art_oppicid, art_oppic_rpath, art_todel, art_state, art_is_sod, art_vid_url FROM VM_ARTICLES_IML WHERE artid IN ( SELECT arfv_artid FROM ARTICLES_FAVORITE_HISTY WHERE arfv_accid = :uid1 AND arfv_fvtid IN (1,2) AND arfv_enddate_tstamp IS NULL ) AND art_todel = 0 ) UNION ( SELECT * FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR WHERE artid IN ( SELECT arfv_artid FROM ARTICLES_FAVORITE_HISTY WHERE arfv_accid = :uid2 AND arfv_fvtid IN (1,2) AND arfv_enddate_tstamp IS NULL ) AND art_todel = 0 ) ORDER BY art_crea_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit ;

( SELECT artid, art_eid, art_picid, art_pic_rpath, art_desc, art_crea_tstamp, art_locip, NULL art_trid, NULL art_trd_eid, NULL art_trd_title, NULL art_trd_desc, NULL art_trd_title_href, NULL art_trd_catgid, NULL art_trd_is_public, NULL art_trd_grat, NULL art_trd_date_tstamp, art_hashs, art_rnb, art_me, art_evals, art_tot, art_oid, art_ogid, art_oeid, art_opsd, art_ofn, art_oppicid, art_oppic_rpath, art_todel, art_state, art_is_sod, art_vid_url FROM VM_ARTICLES_IML WHERE artid IN ( SELECT arfv_artid FROM ARTICLES_FAVORITE_HISTY WHERE arfv_accid = :uid1 AND arfv_fvtid IN (1,2) AND arfv_enddate_tstamp IS NULL ) AND art_eid != :refid1 AND art_crea_tstamp <= :reftm1 AND art_todel = 0 ) UNION ( SELECT * FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR WHERE artid IN ( SELECT arfv_artid FROM ARTICLES_FAVORITE_HISTY WHERE arfv_accid = :uid2 AND arfv_fvtid IN (1,2) AND arfv_enddate_tstamp IS NULL ) AND art_eid != :refid2 AND art_crea_tstamp <= :reftm2 AND art_todel = 0 ) ORDER BY art_crea_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit ;

( SELECT artid, art_eid, art_picid, art_pic_rpath, art_desc, art_crea_tstamp, art_locip, NULL art_trid, NULL art_trd_eid, NULL art_trd_title, NULL art_trd_desc, NULL art_trd_title_href, NULL art_trd_catgid, NULL art_trd_is_public, NULL art_trd_grat, NULL art_trd_date_tstamp, art_hashs, art_rnb, art_me, art_evals, art_tot, art_oid, art_ogid, art_oeid, art_opsd, art_ofn, art_oppicid, art_oppic_rpath, art_todel, art_state, art_is_sod, art_vid_url FROM VM_ARTICLES_IML WHERE artid IN ( SELECT arfv_artid FROM ARTICLES_FAVORITE_HISTY WHERE arfv_accid = :uid1 AND arfv_fvtid IN (1) AND arfv_enddate_tstamp IS NULL ) AND art_todel = 0 ) UNION ( SELECT * FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR WHERE artid IN ( SELECT arfv_artid FROM ARTICLES_FAVORITE_HISTY WHERE arfv_accid = :uid2 AND arfv_fvtid IN (1) AND arfv_enddate_tstamp IS NULL ) AND art_todel = 0 ) ORDER BY art_crea_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit ;

( SELECT artid, art_eid, art_picid, art_pic_rpath, art_desc, art_crea_tstamp, art_locip, NULL art_trid, NULL art_trd_eid, NULL art_trd_title, NULL art_trd_desc, NULL art_trd_title_href, NULL art_trd_catgid, NULL art_trd_is_public, NULL art_trd_grat, NULL art_trd_date_tstamp, art_hashs, art_rnb, art_me, art_evals, art_tot, art_oid, art_ogid, art_oeid, art_opsd, art_ofn, art_oppicid, art_oppic_rpath, art_todel, art_state, art_is_sod, art_vid_url FROM VM_ARTICLES_IML WHERE artid IN ( SELECT arfv_artid FROM ARTICLES_FAVORITE_HISTY WHERE arfv_accid = :uid1 AND arfv_fvtid IN (1) AND arfv_enddate_tstamp IS NULL ) AND art_eid != :refid1 AND art_crea_tstamp <= :reftm1 AND art_todel = 0 ) UNION ( SELECT * FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR WHERE artid IN ( SELECT arfv_artid FROM ARTICLES_FAVORITE_HISTY WHERE arfv_accid = :uid2 AND arfv_fvtid IN (1) AND arfv_enddate_tstamp IS NULL ) AND art_eid != :refid2 AND art_crea_tstamp <= :reftm2 AND art_todel = 0 ) ORDER BY art_crea_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit ;

( SELECT artid, art_eid, art_picid, art_pic_rpath, art_desc, art_crea_tstamp, art_locip, NULL art_trid, NULL art_trd_eid, NULL art_trd_title, NULL art_trd_desc, NULL art_trd_title_href, NULL art_trd_catgid, NULL art_trd_is_public, NULL art_trd_grat, NULL art_trd_date_tstamp, art_hashs, art_rnb, art_me, art_evals, art_tot, art_oid, art_ogid, art_oeid, art_opsd, art_ofn, art_oppicid, art_oppic_rpath, art_todel, art_state, art_is_sod, art_vid_url FROM VM_ARTICLES_IML WHERE artid IN ( SELECT arfv_artid FROM ARTICLES_FAVORITE_HISTY WHERE arfv_accid = :uid1 AND arfv_fvtid IN (2) AND arfv_enddate_tstamp IS NULL ) AND art_todel = 0 ) UNION ( SELECT * FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR WHERE artid IN ( SELECT arfv_artid FROM ARTICLES_FAVORITE_HISTY WHERE arfv_accid = :uid2 AND arfv_fvtid IN (2) AND arfv_enddate_tstamp IS NULL ) AND art_todel = 0 ) ORDER BY art_crea_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit ;

( SELECT artid, art_eid, art_picid, art_pic_rpath, art_desc, art_crea_tstamp, art_locip, NULL art_trid, NULL art_trd_eid, NULL art_trd_title, NULL art_trd_desc, NULL art_trd_title_href, NULL art_trd_catgid, NULL art_trd_is_public, NULL art_trd_grat, NULL art_trd_date_tstamp, art_hashs, art_rnb, art_me, art_evals, art_tot, art_oid, art_ogid, art_oeid, art_opsd, art_ofn, art_oppicid, art_oppic_rpath, art_todel, art_state, art_is_sod, art_vid_url FROM VM_ARTICLES_IML WHERE artid IN ( SELECT arfv_artid FROM ARTICLES_FAVORITE_HISTY WHERE arfv_accid = :uid1 AND arfv_fvtid IN (2) AND arfv_enddate_tstamp IS NULL ) AND art_eid != :refid1 AND art_crea_tstamp <= :reftm1 AND art_todel = 0 ) UNION ( SELECT * FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR WHERE artid IN ( SELECT arfv_artid FROM ARTICLES_FAVORITE_HISTY WHERE arfv_accid = :uid2 AND arfv_fvtid IN (2) AND arfv_enddate_tstamp IS NULL ) AND art_eid != :refid2 AND art_crea_tstamp <= :reftm2 AND art_todel = 0 ) ORDER BY art_crea_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit ;
SELECT count(artid) anb FROM VM_ARTICLES_IML WHERE art_oid = :uid AND art_is_sod = 0;
SELECT count(artid) anb FROM VM_ARTICLES_IML WHERE art_oid = :uid AND art_is_sod = 1;
SELECT count(artid) anb FROM VM_ARTICLES_IML WHERE art_oid = :uid AND art_is_hstd = 1;
SELECT count(artid) anb FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR, TRENDS WHERE art_trid = trid AND art_oid = :uid1 AND trd_owner = :uid2;
SELECT count(artid) anb FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR, TRENDS WHERE art_trid = trid AND art_oid = :uid1 AND trd_owner != :uid2;
SELECT count(arfv_artid) anb FROM ARTICLES_FAVORITE_HISTY WHERE arfv_accid = :uid AND arfv_fvtid IN (1,2) AND arfv_enddate IS NULL;
SELECT count(arfv_artid) anb FROM ARTICLES_FAVORITE_HISTY WHERE arfv_accid = :uid AND arfv_fvtid = 2 AND arfv_enddate IS NULL;
SELECT count(arfv_artid) anb FROM ARTICLES_FAVORITE_HISTY WHERE arfv_accid = :uid AND arfv_fvtid = 1 AND arfv_enddate IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM VM_ARTICLES_IML WHERE art_oid = :uid AND art_is_hstd = 1 ORDER BY art_crea_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;
SELECT * FROM VM_ARTICLES_IML WHERE art_oid = :uid AND art_eid != :refid AND art_crea_tstamp <= :reftm AND art_is_hstd = 1 ORDER BY art_crea_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT TESTIES.*, ( SELECT IFNULL(count(tsrcid),0) FROM TESTY_REACTIONS WHERE tsrc_tstid = tstid ) tst_rnb, ( SELECT IFNULL(count(tlkh_id),0) FROM TESTY_LIKES_HISTY WHERE tlkh_tstid = tstid AND tlkh_enddate_tstamp IS NULL ) tst_cnlk FROM TESTIES LEFT JOIN TESTY_REACTIONS ON tsrc_tstid = tstid LEFT JOIN TESTY_LIKES_HISTY ON tlkh_tstid = tstid GROUP BY tstid HAVING ( tst_rnb >= :must_rnb AND tst_cnlk >= :must_lnb ) OR ( /* COMMON CONSTRAINTS : MUST INCLUDE TSTID */ tstid IN ( SELECT eainc_refid FROM explorer_article_include WHERE eainc_type IN (3) AND eainc_dend_tstamp IS NULL ) /* COMMON CONSTRAINTS : MUST EXCLUDE TSTID */ AND tstid NOT IN ( SELECT eaexc_refid FROM explorer_article_exclude WHERE eaexc_type IN (3) AND eaexc_dend_tstamp IS NULL ) ) ORDER BY tst_adddate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT TESTIES.*, ( SELECT IFNULL(count(tsrcid),0) FROM TESTY_REACTIONS WHERE tsrc_tstid = tstid ) tst_rnb, ( SELECT IFNULL(count(tlkh_id),0) FROM TESTY_LIKES_HISTY WHERE tlkh_tstid = tstid AND tlkh_enddate_tstamp IS NULL ) tst_cnlk FROM TESTIES LEFT JOIN TESTY_REACTIONS ON tsrc_tstid = tstid LEFT JOIN TESTY_LIKES_HISTY ON tlkh_tstid = tstid WHERE tst_eid != :refid AND tst_adddate_tstamp <= :reftm GROUP BY tstid HAVING ( tst_rnb >= :must_rnb AND tst_cnlk >= :must_lnb ) OR ( /* COMMON CONSTRAINTS : MUST INCLUDE TSTID */ tstid IN ( SELECT eainc_refid FROM explorer_article_include WHERE eainc_type IN (3) AND eainc_dend_tstamp IS NULL ) /* COMMON CONSTRAINTS : MUST EXCLUDE TSTID */ AND tstid NOT IN ( SELECT eaexc_refid FROM explorer_article_exclude WHERE eaexc_type IN (3) AND eaexc_dend_tstamp IS NULL ) ) ORDER BY tst_adddate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT TRENDS.*, ( SELECT IFNULL(count(traboid),0) FROM TRABO_HISTY WHERE trabo_trid = trid AND trabo_dateterm_tstamp IS NULL ) trd_abnb, ( SELECT IFNULL(count(artid),0) FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR WHERE art_trid = trid AND art_todel = 0 ) trd_arnb, catg_decocode trd_catg FROM TRCATEGORIES, TRENDS LEFT JOIN TRABO_HISTY ON trabo_trid = trid LEFT JOIN VM_ARTICLES_ITR ON art_trid = trid WHERE trd_catgid = catgid AND trd_next_del_tstamp IS NULL GROUP BY trid HAVING ( trd_abnb >= :must_abnb AND trd_arnb >= :must_arnb ) OR ( /* COMMON CONSTRAINTS : MUST INCLUDE TRID */ trid IN ( SELECT eainc_refid FROM explorer_article_include WHERE eainc_type IN (4) AND eainc_dend_tstamp IS NULL ) /* COMMON CONSTRAINTS : MUST EXCLUDE TRID */ AND trid NOT IN ( SELECT eaexc_refid FROM explorer_article_exclude WHERE eaexc_type IN (4) AND eaexc_dend_tstamp IS NULL ) ) ORDER BY trd_date_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT TRENDS.*, ( SELECT IFNULL(count(traboid),0) FROM TRABO_HISTY WHERE trabo_trid = trid AND trabo_dateterm_tstamp IS NULL ) trd_abnb, ( SELECT IFNULL(count(artid),0) FROM VM_ARTICLES_ITR WHERE art_trid = trid AND art_todel = 0 ) trd_arnb, catg_decocode trd_catg FROM TRCATEGORIES, TRENDS LEFT JOIN TRABO_HISTY ON trabo_trid = trid LEFT JOIN VM_ARTICLES_ITR ON art_trid = trid WHERE trd_catgid = catgid AND trd_catgid = catgid AND trd_next_del_tstamp IS NULL AND trd_eid != :refid AND trd_date_tstamp <= :reftm GROUP BY trid HAVING ( trd_abnb >= :must_abnb AND trd_arnb >= :must_arnb ) OR ( /* COMMON CONSTRAINTS : MUST INCLUDE TRID */ trid IN ( SELECT eainc_refid FROM explorer_article_include WHERE eainc_type IN (4) AND eainc_dend_tstamp IS NULL ) /* COMMON CONSTRAINTS : MUST EXCLUDE TRID */ AND trid NOT IN ( SELECT eaexc_refid FROM explorer_article_exclude WHERE eaexc_type IN (4) AND eaexc_dend_tstamp IS NULL ) ) ORDER BY trd_date_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT tz.gmt_offset AS timezone_diff FROM `timezone_timezone` tz JOIN `timezone_zone` z ON tz.zone_id=z.zone_id WHERE tz.time_start < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(UTC_TIMESTAMP()) AND z.zone_name = :tmzn ORDER BY tz.time_start DESC LIMIT 1 ;

SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(UTC_TIMESTAMP()) + tz.gmt_offset AS local_time FROM `timezone_timezone` tz JOIN `timezone_zone` z ON tz.zone_id=z.zone_id WHERE tz.time_start < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(UTC_TIMESTAMP()) AND z.zone_name = :tmzn ORDER BY tz.time_start DESC LIMIT 1 ;

SELECT count(DISTINCT ltc_ss_refu) count_ssn FROM LTC_SESSIONS WHERE ltc_ss_trid = :trid AND ltc_ss_end_tstamp IS NULL;
SELECT ltc_wmp_ssid FROM LTC_SESSIONS WHERE ltc_ss_trid = :trid AND ltc_ss_end_tstamp IS NULL;

SELECT count(DISTINCT ltc_ss_refu) count_ssn FROM LTC_SESSIONS WHERE ltc_ss_trid IN ( SELECT ltc_ss_trid FROM LTC_SESSIONS WHERE ltc_wmp_ssid = :wmp_ssid AND ltc_ss_end_tstamp IS NULL ) AND ltc_ss_end_tstamp IS NULL;
SELECT ltc_wmp_ssid FROM LTC_SESSIONS WHERE ltc_ss_trid IN ( SELECT ltc_ss_trid FROM LTC_SESSIONS WHERE ltc_wmp_ssid = :wmp_ssid AND ltc_ss_end_tstamp IS NULL ) AND ltc_ss_end_tstamp IS NULL;

SELECT count(ltc_ss_refu) count_ssn FROM LTC_SESSIONS WHERE ltc_ss_trid IN ( SELECT ltc_ss_trid FROM LTC_SESSIONS WHERE ltc_wmp_ssid = :wmp_ssid AND ltc_ss_end_tstamp IS NULL ) AND ltc_ss_refu IN ( SELECT ltc_ss_refu FROM LTC_SESSIONS WHERE ltc_wmp_ssid = :wmp_ssid1 AND ltc_ss_end_tstamp IS NULL ) AND ltc_ss_end_tstamp IS NULL;
SELECT count(ltc_ss_refu) count_ssn FROM LTC_SESSIONS WHERE ltc_ss_trid = :trid AND ltc_ss_refu = :uid AND ltc_ss_end_tstamp IS NULL;

INSERT INTO FRDMEETS_ASKS (fmtask_eid,fmtask_act_uid,fmtask_tgt_uid,fmtask_guests_list_str,fmtask_date_start,fmtask_date_start_tstamp,fmtask_date_end,fmtask_date_end_tstamp,fmtask_place,fmtask_msg,fmtask_askdate,fmtask_askdate_tstamp,fmtask_ssid,fmtask_locip,fmtask_uagent) VALUES (:fmt_eid,:fmt_acuid,:fmt_tguid,:fmt_guests_list_str,:fmt_stdate,:fmt_stdate_tstamp,:fmt_endate,:fmt_endate_tstamp,:fmt_place,:fmt_msg,:fmt_creadate,:fmt_creadate_tstamp,:fmt_ssid,:fmt_locip,:fmt_uagent);
DELETE FROM FRDMEETS_ASKS WHERE fmtask_id = :id ;

SELECT frdmeets_asks.*, PA1.pdaccid acuid, PA1.pdacc_eid acueid, PA1.pdacc_gid acugid, PA1.pdacc_upsd acupsd, PA1.pdacc_ufn acufn, PA2.pdaccid tguid, PA2.pdacc_eid tgueid, PA2.pdacc_gid tgugid, PA2.pdacc_upsd tgupsd, PA2.pdacc_ufn tgufn FROM frdmeets_asks, proddb_accounts PA1, proddb_accounts PA2 WHERE fmtask_act_uid = PA1.pdaccid AND fmtask_tgt_uid = PA2.pdaccid AND fmtask_tgt_uid = :tguid ORDER BY fmtask_askdate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT frdmeets_asks.*, PA1.pdaccid acuid, PA1.pdacc_eid acueid, PA1.pdacc_gid acugid, PA1.pdacc_upsd acupsd, PA1.pdacc_ufn acufn, PA2.pdaccid tguid, PA2.pdacc_eid tgueid, PA2.pdacc_gid tgugid, PA2.pdacc_upsd tgupsd, PA2.pdacc_ufn tgufn FROM frdmeets_asks, proddb_accounts PA1, proddb_accounts PA2 WHERE fmtask_act_uid = PA1.pdaccid AND fmtask_tgt_uid = PA2.pdaccid AND fmtask_tgt_uid = :tguid AND fmtask_eid != :refeid AND fmtask_askdate_tstamp >= :reftm ORDER BY fmtask_askdate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;

SELECT frdmeets_asks.*, PA1.pdaccid acuid, PA1.pdacc_eid acueid, PA1.pdacc_gid acugid, PA1.pdacc_upsd acupsd, PA1.pdacc_ufn acufn, PA2.pdaccid tguid, PA2.pdacc_eid tgueid, PA2.pdacc_gid tgugid, PA2.pdacc_upsd tgupsd, PA2.pdacc_ufn tgufn FROM frdmeets_asks, proddb_accounts PA1, proddb_accounts PA2 WHERE fmtask_act_uid = PA1.pdaccid AND fmtask_tgt_uid = PA2.pdaccid AND fmtask_tgt_uid = :tguid AND fmtask_eid != :refeid AND fmtask_askdate_tstamp <= :reftm ORDER BY fmtask_askdate_tstamp DESC LIMIT :limit;
SELECT * FROM FRDMEETS_RESP, FRDMEETS_ASKS WHERE fmtre_fmtask_id = fmtask_id AND fmtask_eid = :eid ;
SELECT * FROM FRDMEETS_ASKS LEFT JOIN FRDMEETS_RESP ON fmtre_fmtask_id = fmtask_id WHERE fmtask_eid = :eid ;

INSERT INTO FRDMEETS_RESP (fmtre_eid,fmtre_fmtask_id,fmtre_resp_type,fmtre_respdate,fmtre_respdate_tstamp,fmtre_ssid,fmtre_locip,fmtre_uagent) VALUES (:fre_eid,:fmt_id,:fre_typ,:fre_date,:fre_tstamp,:ssid,:locip,:uagent);
INSERT INTO FRDMEETS_GUESTS (fmtgst_fmtask,fmtgst_gst_uid) VALUES (:fmt_id,:gst_uid);

SELECT pdaccid gst_uid, pdacc_eid gst_ueid, pdacc_gid gst_ugid, pdacc_upsd gst_upsd, pdacc_ufn gst_ufn FROM FRDMEETS_GUESTS, FRDMEETS_ASKS, proddb_accounts WHERE fmtgst_fmtask = fmtask_id AND fmtgst_gst_uid = pdaccid AND fmtask_eid = :eid ;
SELECT * FROM FRDMEETS_GUESTS, FRDMEETS_ASKS WHERE fmtgst_fmtask = fmtask_id AND fmtgst_gst_uid = :uid AND fmtask_eid = :feid;
SELECT * FROM FRDMEETS_RESP_GUESTS, FRDMEETS_GUESTS, FRDMEETS_ASKS WHERE fmtregst_fmtgst_id = fmtgst_id AND fmtregst_fmtgst_id = fmtask_id AND fmtgst_fmtask = fmtask_id AND fmtask_eid = :eid ;
SELECT * FROM email_history WHERE accid = :accid AND date_EndEna IS NULL;
SELECT accid FROM accounts WHERE accid = :accid AND date_EndEna IS NULL;

INSERT INTO accounts (pflid, accpseudo, accpseudo_datemod, accpseudo_datemod_tstamp, acclang, acclang_datemod, acclang_datemod_tstamp, acc_socialarea, acc_authpwd, authpwd_datemod, authpwd_datemod_tstamp, acc_capital, staycon, secu_coWithPseudoEna, secu_isThirdCritEna, accIsBan, todelete, datecrea, datecrea_tstamp, menu_pfl_notf, menu_pfl_notf_tstamp, menu_acc_notf, menu_acc_notf_tstamp, menu_secu_notf, menu_secu_notf_tstamp, secu_lock_h_start, secu_lock_h_end, secu_lock_d_start, secu_lock_d_start_tstamp, secu_lock_d_end, secu_lock_d_end_tstamp) VALUES (:pflid, :accpseudo, :accpseudo_datemod, :accpseudo_datemod_tstamp, :acclang, :acclang_datemod, :acclang_datemod_tstamp, :acc_socialarea, :hashedPw, :authpwd_datemod, :authpwd_datemod_tstamp, :acc_capital, :staycon, :secu_coWithPseudoEna, :secu_isThirdCritEna, :accIsBan, :todelete, :datecrea, :datecrea_tstamp, :menu_pfl_notf, :menu_pfl_notf_tstamp, :menu_acc_notf, :menu_acc_notf_tstamp, :menu_secu_notf, :menu_secu_notf_tstamp, :secu_lock_h_start, :secu_lock_h_end, :secu_lock_d_start, :secu_lock_d_start_tstamp, :secu_lock_d_end, :secu_lock_d_end_tstamp);

query.note.value: Grosse requête de création de compte. Note: l'acc_eid sera ajouté après

query.body.value: SELECT p.uborndate_tstamp, p.ugender, ct.ctr_code FROM profils p INNER JOIN partner_gn_cities_5000 gn ON p.ulvcity = gn.city_id INNER JOIN countries ct ON gn.country_code = ct.ctr_code WHERE p.pflid = :pflid;

query.note.value: Mise à jour de accounts

query.body.value: UPDATE delacc_history SET cancel_date = :now, cancel_date_tstamp = :now_tstamp WHERE accid = :accid AND cancel_date IS NULL ;
UPDATE abo_grp_histo SET dateEnd = :dateend, dateEnd_tstamp = :dateend_tstamp WHERE accid = :accid AND gid = :gid AND dateEnd IS NULL;

SELECT accounts.accid, acc_eid, accpseudo, ufullname, profilpictures.picid as acc_uppicid, pflpic_pathTo_min as acc_uppic, acccoverpics.picid as acc_coverpicid, acccoverpics.acp_pathTo_cover as acc_coverpic, ulvcity, asciiname, ctr_code, ctr_name, acclang, accounts.datecrea as acc_datecrea, accounts.datecrea_tstamp as acc_datecrea_tstamp, todelete FROM accounts, acccoverpics, acccoverpics_history, profils, pflpics_history, profilpictures, Partner_GN_Cities_5000, countries WHERE accounts.accid = acccoverpics_history.accid AND acccoverpics_history.acp_id = acccoverpics.acp_id AND accounts.pflid = profils.pflid AND profils.pflid = pflpics_history.pflid AND pflpics_history.pflpicid = profilpictures.pflpicid AND profils.ulvcity = Partner_GN_Cities_5000.city_id AND Partner_GN_Cities_5000.country_code = countries.ctr_code AND acccoverpics_history.date_EndEna IS NULL AND accounts.accid = :accid;

SELECT accounts.accid, abo_grp_histo.gid, acc_capital, acc_eid, accpseudo, ufullname, profilpictures.picid as acc_uppicid, pflpic_pathTo_min as acc_uppic, acccoverpics.picid as acc_coverpicid, acccoverpics.acp_pathTo_cover as acc_coverpic, ulvcity, asciiname, ctr_code, ctr_name, acclang, accounts.datecrea as acc_datecrea, accounts.datecrea_tstamp as acc_datecrea_tstamp, todelete FROM accounts, acccoverpics, acccoverpics_history, profils, pflpics_history, profilpictures, Partner_GN_Cities_5000, countries, abo_grp_histo WHERE accounts.accid = acccoverpics_history.accid AND acccoverpics_history.acp_id = acccoverpics.acp_id AND accounts.pflid = profils.pflid AND profils.pflid = pflpics_history.pflid AND pflpics_history.pflpicid = profilpictures.pflpicid AND profils.ulvcity = Partner_GN_Cities_5000.city_id AND Partner_GN_Cities_5000.country_code = countries.ctr_code AND acccoverpics_history.date_EndEna IS NULL AND abo_grp_histo.accid = accounts.accid AND accounts.accid = :accid;
